story:
Questions and suggestions? contact us on:

darkcryptorstudios@gmail.com

Alyssa is a  first-person survival horror game. Its disturbing atmosphere, various lighting systems and custom audio combine to provide a great  mixture of tension and anxiety throughout the course of the game.

You play the role of Drew Barnes, who after an accident near Kirkdale Road, England, stumbles toward a seemingly abandoned house in search of help. Discover the horrible secrets that lie behind these walls and bring to light the disappearance of Alyssa Morgan, the girl missing from the house for over six years... 

The random system allows infinite replayability of this title, the spawn of the various objects and special events will take place randomly during the game. 

Challenging gameplay: 

The gameplay will challenge even the most experienced, leaving you to decide between fleeing in terror or confronting your fears.

Replayability: 
All quest and puzzle items are spawned on launch meaning no two play throughs are ever the same leaving you as the player to best choose how to solve particullar puzzles. 

Kits and Accessories: 
You will have a lantern that will be the most valuable object that you acquire in all (or almost all) the rest of the game. Unfortunately for you, it is not infinite, you'll have to find the fuel to keep it on or you will be in the dark... In total you can carry 6 extra items that will help you survive, such as the camera that will let you see further, or the radio that emits a frequency when you are in danger, and much more! 

Physics: 
In Alyssa you will be Able to grab and move various objects in the scene.  You can use this to create hideouts -  bases where you can use your extra accessories in relative safety, or to find various hidden items hidden within the house. 

Multiplayer:
Please note the multiplayer will be available only if the campaign reaches its the final goal of 10,000 €. It will be based on various game maps. The first player tries to find all the keys and accessories and will have to escape without dying. The second player takes the role of Alyssa, and will have to find and kill the players before they flee. Alyssa has the distinction of seeing in the dark, but is slower than the others. 

Alyssa is not a game for the faint of heart. We have playing and studying horror titles over the years, and the true success of these games is not only based on the "jumpscare", but above all the level of tension and anxiety that the player feels. These are the feelings that you will find inside Alyssa. 


You will not have a HUD on the screen nor a minimap or another, we want to create a  player experience that is as immersive as possible.

Five of us have been working for several months to realize what you can see of Alyssa and we are very proud of our work and what we have achieved so far. Unfortunately, our savings are running out and we were forced to work in other areas, which does not leave much time to develop the title. We still need time to complete this project and work on it full time. That's why we need funds to keep going.         

Administrative costs. Related to the management consulting business, legal and tax.

Hosting & Website. We have to buy a hosting and in turn to create a website for Alyssa

Support Mac and Linux. To release the game on these platforms you must purchase the license for the Unity Team and buy one Mac. 

Oculus Rift. Buy one or more Oculus Rift to integrate augmented reality into Alyssa. Only if we reach the goal of 5,000 €

In total if we can achieve the various goals we would have the opportunity to realize the game in the shortest possible time, provide a title even more rich in content and gameplay more exciting! not to mention the Multyplayer! 

● Alyssa digital copy for your chosen platform. 
The digital copy of the game. you will receive it when the game is complete. 

● The Survival Kit (Unlock Survival Kit in in-game time immediately!) 
This kit will allow you to unlock right now all 6 extra items to survive 

● Digital Soundtrack 
You will receive all the original soundtrack of Alyssa. 

● PDF Strategy Guide (Sent to you before the game launches!) 
The strategy guide will teach you how to survive, how to best use the accessories and much more! 

● 5 Extra Wallpaper 1080p 
5 Wallpaper in Full HD for your desktop! 

● Exclusive Beta access. 
You will experience the game before the release in Beta! 

● Secret Guide PDF with all the Ester Egg (Sent to you before the game launches!) 
The guide contains all the secrets hidden within the video game! 

● Exclusive Alpha Assist 
Exclusive videos during the making of the video game version of Alpha. 

● The Secret Key (The key for a Super Secret Room) 
This key will allow you to open a door super secret inside Alyssa. 

● Your name in the credits 
Your name will be included in the credits of the game. 

● Your name in the game! 
Your name will be placed within the game, in some book, wall or other. 

● "VIP" title on the forums! 
You'll get access to the VIP section in our future forum. 

● Skype contact for chat and talk with the developers! 
You'll have our contact Skype to talk and chat with the team! 

● All of our future projects will be yours free forever! 
All of our games and future projects will receive them free forever!

What platforms will be available Alyssa? and When?
PC, Mac, Linux! It is not currently planned to be released on consoles. But if all goes well we will be able to release the game on both Xbox Playstation! 

How many languages ​​has Alyssa? 
English and Italian. Add two more translations extra if we exceed our goals of funding, supporters can vote for their preferred language through our survey.

There will be support for multiplayer? 
If we reach our goal, yes! and it will be amazing! 

When will I receive my prize?
Most of the awards will be presented after the final release of the game.

Can I replay Alyssa?
Certainly our random system allows you to replay Alyssa without any repetition and forever!

The game could delay the release?
There is always the possibility that the game will delay its release due to technical problems or force majeure. But do not worry because dedicate all the time necessary to finish alyssa in the shortest possible time.

Also, if you haven't seen it yet, check out the awesome shoutout from Torchwood actor Gareth David Lloyd!  http://havencontx.com/

si no pudiste ver el video, por favor da click en este link

if you could not see the video, please click on this link

if you have time to watch a video we invite you to see the full description here.

si usted tiene tiempo para ver un video lo invitamos a ver la descripcion completa aqui.


¿Quienes Somos? (About Us)

 Hola, Somos  Miguel  y Alicia cofundadores  de Applause Contenidos Digitales, una micro empresa (startup) con una visión social, que esta comenzando con el propósito de desarrollar tecnología móvil:  Apps - Videogames que generen un impacto positivo a  nuestra sociedad.

Hi, we are Miguel and Alicia, we are Co-founders of Applause Contenidos Digitales, its a Start Up that is beginning with the vision to develop application for mobile devices and digital contents like animations, video games that generate a positive impact in the community besides to generate appreciation. 

Nuestro Propósito (Our Goal)

Vamos a desarrollar KidsKademmy: Una serie de vídeo juegos de aventura, que tiene inmerso en su historia una terapia diseñada por un especialista en dificultades del aprendizaje, para ayudar a niños que tienen dislexia a superar esta dificultad.

We are developing KidsKademmy, it is a video game adventure series that has immersed into its history a therapy designed by a specialist in learning disabilities.
With Kidskademmy we can help to children with dyslexia  overcome this disability.


¿Por que esto es importante? ( Why that is important)

He aquí unas razones:

  • La dislexia afecta al 15% de la población del mundo.(http://kidshealth.org/parent/en_espanol/general...)
  • Más del 10% de los niños del mundo padecen de dislexia. Eso es más de 200 millones de niños.
  • Los niños con dislexia Tendrán dificultad para: leer, escribir, vocalizar, entender.
  • Los niños con dislexia serán, diagnosticados equivocadamente como niños con problemas emocionales o sicológicos.
  • A los niños con dislexia en muchas ocasiones se les considerará: perezosos, desinteresados, tontos, y esto afectara su identidad y estima propia.
  • Con el paso del tiempo no superarán esta dificultad, Solo superaran la dislexia con terapia especial.

Here are some reasons:

  • Dyslexia affects 15 percent of the world population (http://kidshealth.org/parent/medical/learning/d...)
  • More than 10% of the world’s children suffer dyslexia, that’s more than 200 million kids.
  • They will have difficulties to read, to write, to vocalize and even understand.
  • They will be misdiagnosed as children with emotional and psychological issues.
  • TThey would be considered as lazy, un-interested, handicap, and even affecting their self-esteem.ime won’t only heal, this learning disorder.These children will overcome this difficulty with a special therapy.


  ¿Por que vamos a ofrecer esta terapia por medio de los videojuegos?


  1. Los niños aman los videojuegos !!!
  2. Las mecánicas de los juegos de vídeo implementan las técnicas de terapia de aprendizaje fácilmente.
  3. El progreso del niño se da,  dentro de un marco de diversión y sin ningún tipo de presión.
  4. Con las tiendas para dispositivos móviles, personas,  niños de diferentes lugares, ciudades y países, de zonas remotas y alejadas pueden acceder a descargar el videojuego con la terapia.
  5. Los niños de bajos recursos tendrán acceso a la terapia  ya que los  pueden tener en sus dispositivos: en sus teléfonos  móviles o tabletas digitales.

Why therapeutic videogames?

  1. The kids love…. Videogames!!! 
  2. The mechanics of video games can easily implement the techniques of therapy.
  3. Videogames will ensure that the child’s progress is given within a frame of fun and without any kind of pressure (stress)
  4. Now with the mobile devices stores, people and children who live in different places, cities, countries and in remote areas, have access to download the game with the therapy.
  5. The children belonged to low-income families can have access to the videogames since they can get them from their devices, mobile phones and tablets.

Fácil distribución por medio de Internet  (Easy distribution over the internet)

Acceso fácil desde lugares remotos (Easy access from remote locations)


Nuestra Experiencia (Our Experience)

MIGUEL VILLAN. Ingeniero Electrónico, Especialista en desarrollo de aplicaciones para dispositivos móviles, PSP developer Certified. Vinculado al programa de fortalecimiento en desarrollo de videojuegos (JumpCamp) de la Universidad de los Andes y el Ministerio de las Comunicaciones de Colombia.

Electronic engineer with a specialization in developing applications for mobile devices, PSP Developer Certified Currently I am part of the program of strengthening in game development(JumpCamp) at the Andes University and the Communication Ministry of Colombia.

CV en Linkedin : http://co.linkedin.com/pub/miguel-villan/34/301/15/

 ALICIA VALENCIA, Trabajadora Social, especialista en psicología jurídica, cursando estudios de inclusión para personas con discapacidad en las Tic (tecnologías de la información) Ministerio de las Comunicaciones de Colombia.

Social worker with a specialization in legal psychology. Currently my studies are focused in inclusion Handicapped IT (Information Technology, Communication Ministry of Colombia).

Experiencia en Voluntariado (Volunteerism Experience)

Hemos trabajado con organizaciones de voluntariado en diferentes ciudades del país ayudando a niños y adolescentes.  

We also have worked with voluntary organizations in different locations of the country helping kids and teenagers


Lo que necesitamos (Our needs) 



Nuestra meta es recaudar US $10.000 que serán utilizados en la compra de un equipo Mac, para el desarrollo de aplicaciones para la plataforma IOS, el pago de las cuentas de desarrollador de IOS y Google, las licencias de software para los programas de música,  para la música que va a tener el videojuego, las licencias para el programa de animación y  también para los honorarios de  4 meses de diseño y desarrollo del videojuego.

Our goal here in Indiegogo is to raise $ 10,000 (ten thousand) dollars, which will be used in the purchase of a Mac to develop applications for the IOS platform, to pay the bills for the developer IOS and Google, to pay the software licenses for the music programs that the videogame will have, licenses for the entertainment program and also to pay the fees for four months of design and development of the game.

  • Mac Computer US $2300 (in Colombia)
  • ipad US$500
  • Apple and Google developer Account US$130
  • Logic Pro- Music Software US $ 230
  • Desing arts and Programming for 4 months US$7000

En caso de no lograr la meta total, el dinero recaudado se invertirá de la siguiente manera.

Failure to achieve the overall goal, the money raised will be invested as follows.

Si quieres aportar económicamente te invitamos a que selecciones entre las siguientes recompensas una con la que puedes participar.


If you want to contribute financially we invite you to select between the following rewards one with which you can participate


Recompensas  (Rewards)

Combo ($5USD) [SACRIFICIO - SACRIFICE]


Combo ($10USD) [ESPERANZA - HOPE]


Combo ($15USD) [SONRISA - SMILE]


Combos -  ($25 USD)   [UNIDAD - UNITY]


 Combo  ($25 USD) [MOTIVACION - MOTIVATION]


Combo ($40USD) [AVANCE - ADVANCE]


Combo ($50USD)  [VIRTUD - VIRTUE]


Combo ($50USD) [ESFUERZO - EFFORT]


Combo($75USD) [SATISFACCION - SATISFACTION]



Combo ($80USD) [PERSEVERANCIA - PERSEVERANCE]



Combo($105USD) [HONOR ]



Combo ($115USD) [CONFIANZA - CONFIDENCE]



Combo ($125USD) [SUEÑOS - DREAMS]



Combo ($180USD) [AMOR AL PROJIMO - LOVE OF NEIGHBOR]


Combo ($250USD) [BONDAD - GOODNESS]


Combo ($500USD) [SABIDURÍA - WISDOM]



Combo ($1000USD) [GENEROSIDAD - GENEROSITY]


***No olvides agregar a tu recompensa el costo del envío
***Do not forget to add to your reward shipping cost

****Tabla de costos Envíos desde Colombia - Shipping cost table from Colombia*****


**Craft Keychains and magnets will have a design related to the KidsKademmy campaign.**


Otras formas en las que puedes ayudar

Ayudanos a difundir nuestra campaña, de manera que muchas más personas la puedan conocer. 

Nosotros creemos en la educación,en el beneficio que esta aporta a los niños, creemos en este proyecto y por ello necesitamos tu aporte. 

Gracias por ayudarnos a alcanzar este sueño.


Help us spread our campaign, so that many more people can meet.

We believe in education, we believe in the benefits that this brings to the children, we believe in this project and we need your contribution.

Thanks for helping us achieve this dream.

story:
"Charlie | The Legend" is a Multiplayer asymmetrical horror video game in which 4 Survivors must face a diabolical doll possessed by a demon.
You decide! Play as Charlie and defeat the other players or face Charlie as a survivor.

My name is Mijail Casas and I am the lead developer of Fireblitz Games, the "One Man" studio that has been developing "Charlie" since January 2018.
In these first two years of development I have developed 65% of the game. Things like the main code of the game, UI design, design and animations of "Charlie" or the multiplayer logic are stuff that are already finished. That means the game is already a real game and you can create online matches to play with other people, you can handle both Charlie and survivors.

Why am I here?
Well, these two years of development have been quite hard, the workload I've been subjected to has been greater than I initially thought. The project has been growing and evolving as it was being developed and also certain demands from the project's followers have made it worthwhile to make it a little bigger and better.

And this is where this Indiegogo campaign comes in and makes sense.
Currently it is necessary to design many of the models of the characters (Survivors) of the game, their skins and unlockable content as well as it is necessary to continue working on the design of the maps and improving some aspects of the gameplay in order to create the perfect game experience.

To do this I need to hire a group of artists and other specialists to help me give the final push that "Charlie" needs to live up to his expectations.

With that extra help we can finish the game in less time and at the same time we can have a better product to offer the players.

 

· SURVIVORS ·

The goal in a "Charlie" match will be different depending on whether you choose to play as a doll or a survivor.
As a Survivor you will have to take into account several factors in order to successfully finish the match.
Each survivor has 3 chances to reach their goal. This means that you can reappear in the match if you are eliminated a maximum of 3 times. From then on, you will have to wait until the match is over or two of your teammates bring you back using a "ritual".

 

 

You must be careful because you will have reduced health compared to "Charlie" and although you can regain your health using first aid kits, these are limited and you must take into account that the rest of the survivors will also want to use them.

As a survivor you will have two ways to end the match successfully. Escape from the map alive or defeat Charlie.
In order to escape from the map you will have to follow several steps that will be different depending on the map you are in. Knowing how to play your cards properly and not wasting time will be key to achieving this.
If time runs out or you don't see the possibility of escaping from the map, there is also the option of defeating Charlie.
The first option would be to kill him 3 times since those are the lives he has. But be careful, Charlie's health is 10 times greater than a survivor's health and you will have to deal with all the powers that the doll has.

 

 

The second option to defeat Charlie is to make him go back to hell. It will not be easy and it will be a task that will have to be carried out among several survivors.

Will you have the courage to be a real survivor?

 

 

· CHARLIE ·

Playing as Charlie will have all the powers of a dark demon in your hands. But obviously you'll have to save your strength so that you don't stand unarmed in front of the survivors who decide to fight you.

 

 

Charlie will have a lot of health and 3 lives that you will have to take care of if you don't want the survivors to escape.
Charlie's skills are unique and special, useful for every situation and their use will require a certain strategy that if carried out carefully can lead you to success.

 

 

Claw Attack, Dark Fire, Shield, Detection, Teleport or Possession are some of Charlie's skills that you can use to take on the survivors.


You'll also have the extra help of "Scavengers" that you can invoke at certain points on the map and that will keep the survivors "busy" while you carry out your evil plans.

 

 

Charlie also has the option to recover his health by collecting dark orbs.

These orbs will not be easy to find and will only add a small amount of health but will be very useful when you only have one life and need a little help to finish the match.

 

 

Charlie's darkest skill and the one for which the survivors must take the most care is "Possession".

 

 

This skill fills up as the match progresses and with every kill Charlie performs. When available, Charlie will be able to possess his enemies and take full control of their actions.
This allows one survivor to eliminate another survivor while being possessed by Charlie.
When Charlie is in possession of a survivor, he will also have the option to perform a "Final Kill".

 

 

The main goal is to be able to finish the game and offer you a complete product with a lot of content since its release.

It is necessary to expand the project team to be able to finish the game in less time and at the same time be able to include better and more content.

Your support is greatly appreciated!
This is my way of saying thank you!

Some of the items you can get supporting "Charlie | The Legend"

 

- Psycho Skin (Indiegogo Exclusive)

 

- Patient 1310 (Founders Skin)

- Skull Costume Skin

 

- Bad Boy (Developer Skin)

 

 

*Note: I will contact each backer to find out what system you want your keys for.

· Exclusive Wallpaper Pack (Digital) ·

Give your desktop and mobile a new look with this exclusive wallpaper pack of the game

· Honor Backer Badge (In-Game) ·

This badge will be displayed in the game next to your nick name and it will be shown to the other players.

· "Charlie | The Legend" *Game Key (Digital download) ·

*Note: I will contact each backer to find out what system you want your keys for.

·PRIVATE BETA ACCESS

Try the game before anyone else and help us improve it by sending us your comments and suggestions.

· "Charlie | The Legend" Original Soundtrack (Digital download) ·

Enjoy the music of your new favorite game wherever you want.

· "Charlie | The Legend" Giant Poster (Printable) ·

3600 x 5400 pixels (Movie Poster Size)

 

· Your name in the Credits ·

If you make this possible, you're part of the team.
That's why I think you should be mentioned in the game credits.

If it is not possible to reach the main goal, the game will obviously not be the same as we want to do and it will take much longer to finish.
But there is already too much work done so the game will be released anyway.

What has been collected will be used as I have done so far with the donations I have received till now, investing the money well in everything that can make the project better but always within the available budget.

That's why I need your help, without you this doesn't make sense and for me it's also important to know that I'm not alone in this adventure.

 

"Charlie" Official Website

Discord Channel

Fireblitz Games Facebook

"Charlie" Official Twitter

"Charlie" Official Instagram

Fireblitz Games YouTube Channel

Artstation Profile

story:
Current Merged Funding Total: $50,000

Current Merged Funding Goal: $50,000

Here is the reward for our current merged goal of 50k:

Backers of "Count" level and above will receive 1, while "Prince" level and above will receive 4.

 

 

 

Plus the grand super mystery prize for achieving the final goal of the campaign!

 

 

 



 

Previous Successful Campaign Link

Indie GoGo Purpose

During our ridiculously successful crowdfunding campaign on that other popular site, we've received innumerable requests for Paypal payments, multi language support, and a way to bring friends in who missed the boat. This campaign will do just that.

We're now doing merged stretch goals, so you lucky Indie GoGo backers get to benefit from the previous pledges & prizes; and everyone (including backers from our other campaign) gets to unlock more Stretch Goal Prizes.

We're also wanting to implement as much multi language support as possible. Currently we have lined up: French, Japanese, Chinese and German.

If you're concerned this goal is too low to create a high calliber game, kindly note this is one part of our Merged Funding Campaign and take a look at what we've done so far; art, pledge and fan wise in just 30 days. :)

Core Gameplay Overview Video

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Jh1kuin7iOI

Indie GoGo Legendary Reward

Yes, this is an actual animated card in game. It's also the Legendary card you get as thanks for backing our project. 

(May take a little while to fully load)

Whether You Pledge or Not Come Like Us Here

and to stay in the loop after the Indie GoGo like our Facebook page:

Patient Zero is awarded to every "Count" and above ("Princes and above get 4 instead), for more stretch goals see far below.

Basic Information, Especially for PC and Mobile Gamers Video

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=PwJ50ddIu2w

0:00 - What is Infinity Wars?
1:25 - How often will you add new cards to the collection?
2:00 - Is it hard to learn?
2:32 - Favorite Feature?
3:00 - Art Theme
4:13 - IndieGoGo Rewards
4:55 - Thank You

Detailed Gameplay Commentary Video

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=n9n0SSwKmZY 

Advanced Information, Especially for Trading Card Gamers Video

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=2OOQqzBt9-Y 

0:00 - So, who are you dudes?
1:38 - How long for a Trading Card Gamer to learn?
2:43 - About the World
3:48 - Free to Play & Updates
5:48 - Cloud Storage
6:34 - Card Re-Usage
7:05 - What if I don't have time for a full game?
7:41 - Simultaneous Turn-Based Multiplayer
10:15 - Card Mechanic Enhancements Over Major Trading Card Games
12:04 - Locations
12:50 - Trading, Tournaments and Prize Money
13:58 - Thank You Hardcore Gamers

Why You Will Love Our Game

  • Free to Play – You could eventually acquire every card in-game by buying packets using earned currency, as long as you can keep up with our development team that is tasked with creating new ongoing content. This is the good free to play, no "energy gates" or "exclusive to buying with real world cash" cards.
  • "Merged Deck" Mode - We're designing an optional, casual mode specifically for anyone who thinks Trading Card Games are all "Pay to Win", Eurogamers or Board Game Strategists; that want a completely even playing field each match. The overall design revolves around merging the decks of both players into one huge deck, so no matter what cards each player has collected, it will only come down to skill and luck of the draw. 
  • Fully Animated Decks - Every single card in Infinity Wars is animated; this is the true evolution of Trading Card Games to Digital.
  • Comprehensive Tutorial Quests - Gamers new to trading card games are shown through "Beginner Quests": how to play and craft a winning deck.
  • Simultaneous Gameplay - Each turn is taken at the same time allowing for near constant interaction and welcoming intriguing bluff & prediction tactics.
  • Remote Turn-Based Multiplayer – Play games with anyone in the world, from anywhere with internet access.
  • Hardcore Strategy - Most digital trading card games have oversimplified and gone all mainstream with their game mechanics. We've done the opposite and increased strategic depth by including positioning, yet allowing unlimited cards on field.
  • Weekly New Releases - New quests are created constantly providing new levels and brand new cards to unlock each and every week.
  • Comprehensive Ever Changing Single Player Campaign - We have an in depth Single Player Campaign, that will have side quests added to it each week. All cards unlockable without ever needing to play a human.
  • 3D Transformable Battlefield - The default 3D Battlefield can be changed by playing Location cards which transform the field of play.
 

Stretch Goals

Together, we can obliterate the initial merged campaign goal and get every "Count" and "Prince" more rewards. 

For every goal we pass:

Each "Count" (and "Duke") will get one of EVERY stretch goal prize unlocked by the end of the campaign.

Each "Prince" (and higher) will get 4 of EVERY stretch goal prize unlocked by the end of the campaign.

Note this is limited to one set of prizes for each backer, so ordering 2x "Counts" will NOT give you two of every card.

Here's the Prizes already unlocked thanks to our other crowdfunding campaign. Anyone funding here on Indie GoGo at the relevant level instantly gets ALL these cards as a bonus:

 

650 backers

40k achieved

 

 33k prize unlocked.

 

27k prize achieved

 

22k prize achieved, Hellmouth Location Card.

17k Prize Achieved

13k Prize Achieved (2 for "Counts" and "Dukes", 8 for "Princes" and above).

330 Backers Prize Achieved.

5k Prize Achieved.

120 Backers Prize Achieved.

7k Prize Achieved.

220 Backers Prize Achieved.

9.5k Prize Achieved.

And here's a snapshot of the achieved and announced goals:

Indie GoGo Rewards

 

What We've Done So Far

Gameplay Prototype Screenshot

Prototype Deck Editor

3 More Example Animated Cards

Currently we're midway through our Alpha stage, with most cards created and our standard multiplayer game mode fully working. We'll be heading into Closed Alpha on December 7th, so you won't have to wait long to start experiencing and influencing how the game will play when it goes public. Closed Beta will be around January.

Rest assured there's no chance the game won't make it to release as we have more than enough private funds to cover basic production; your pledges will allow us to bring extra features and get the game launched in as many countries as possible.

Why We Want To Do This

We’ve been waiting and waiting for a “proper” Digital Trading Card game to be made for a couple of years now; and whilst there are Digital Trading Card games out there, rarely are they truly strategic and deep, and we’ve found none have hit on all levels and made full use of this wonderful digital technology most of us have in our pockets. It felt like being hit in the face with a Kobold club when we realized the world was ready for one, and we are the guys to do it. 

We’re an independently owned and funded studio, with talented artists and genius coders, who are in love with both video games and card games. Your pledges allow us to create an even better game than we would without it, and we get to thank you for causing that with exclusive rewards.

The First Five Factions

 

The Sleepers of Avarrach

Lore – On the world of Avarrach, cybernetic modifications were the norm, its citizens enhancing their bodies with nano technology. However, sleeping within their nanobot technology was a dangerous flaw: a backdoor which could rewrite any any nearby nanobot into a copy of itself. One day, centuries ago, a nanobot virus was unleashed upon the world: one that would take over the host’s body, killing it, then aggressively spread to each nearby nanobot. The world of Avarrach turned into a nightmare. Within three days, 90% of the world turned into unthinking husks, the human host dead, but animated by the nanobot technologies embedded in their body. The survivors, those without augmentations, fought as best they could, but soon were overwhelmed. The nanobots took over their bodies and they too joined the undead horde.

The virus animated each body to seek out and feed on any living thing, and for years, the zombies went on a rampage, devouring all living things they could find, until eventually the planet was completely devoid of life. With nothing left to feed on, the undead stopped moving, sleeping, the virus waiting for new living to devour. There they laid for hundreds of years, unmoving. When the rifts opened to the Old World, the Sleepers of Ararrach slowly woke from their deep sleep, smelling new life to feed on.

As only the Sleepers closest to the rifts have awoken, few understand the true danger. However, in time the whole planet will awaken, and every world will face an incredible threat.

Mechanics - The Sleepers of Avarrach are relentless, and ultimately unstoppable. While a single zombie is of little threat, over time more and more zombies arrive, overwhelming the enemy. Killing a Sleeper of Avarrach is often only a temporary respite, as they are the best faction at using their graveyard, bringing many cards back from the dead, over and over until the enemy is overwhelmed. Furthermore, many of the Sleepers are infectious: when they kill an enemy character, that character gets turned into an undead, and the Sleepers gain control of it. To defeat the Sleepers, enemy players must manage keeping the undead under check, while simultaneously advancing their own plan swiftly enough to win before they are overwhelmed.

The Cult of Verore

Lore - The Cult of Verore delves deep into black magic, constantly perfecting their spells of death. It was they who opened the Hellmouth, unleashing the demons into Reish and covering their world in darkness. A corrupted Aleta, the leader of the Verore, cares little. 

Mechanics - The Cult focuses on character removal abilities, they are the masters of making things die. Sitting from the support zone, their unlimited character - the Verore Death Watchers - become stronger with each enemy that goes to the grave, until they are able to destroy the opposing player from the power they fed off. However, if their kill spells are successfully dodged by being moved into the support zone by a skilled player, the Verore can find themselves overwhelmed by their enemies. 

Genesis Industries 

Lore - Genesis Industries seeks to remodel the world with their highly advanced, hyper efficient technologies. Everything and anything can be improved to be bigger, faster, stronger. Orion, the leader of Genesis Industries, is a visionary who is on a mission to ensure the world is able to keep up with the accelerating demands of civilization, a mission in which nature’s time has past, and anybody who stands in the way must be destroyed. 

 Mechanics - Genesis Industries cards are the masters of building up. With time and an influx of resources, the Industry can build up huge, overpowering characters that dominate the battlefield. Furthermore, they are the masters of reusing their resources, able to recur cards from their graveyard to continue their fighting effort. A Genesis Industries player must be find a fine line between power and greed however, as putting all their eggs in one basket with a single powerful character can be disastrous if they misread their opponent. 

The Flame Dawn 

Lore - The Flame Dawn is an organized, aggressive army. Their leader, Aberion, is said to be invincible in battle, and nobody has been able to prove it wrong. He leads an aggressive campaign to expand the borders of the Flame Dawn, to forge a great empire that will last for ages. When the rifts opened, The Flame Dawn immediately entered and began aggressively claiming territory under their flag. 

 Mechanics - Flame Dawn cards are very aggressive, aiming to win the game quickly with a swarm of characters before other, lumbering strategies can come fully online, or at least deal so much damage in the early turns of the game that the enemy is always on the back foot. The cost for their speed, however, is a lack of staying power, as their removal abilities are all temporary, providing a window for victory that they must quickly seize. 

The Warpath

Lore - The Warpath is not so much a faction as a collective understanding by the beasts of the Old World that they must fight back against the intruders. Named not by themselves, but by the invaders from the other dimensions upon seeing the horror of hundreds of massive beasts bearing down on them with killing intent, “being caught on the warpath” is a horror story passed between all the would-be conquerors of the Old World. 

Mechanics - Like the beasts of The Warpath, the cards of The Warpath are usually simple, but strong. There are no small beasts. Each beast is a large killer, often able to take on many characters from other factions in direct combat before dying. The beasts strengthen each other, and have the ability to breed together, able to create new beasts to destroy the opponent with. However, the Warpath’s greatest strength is also their greatest weakness, as their focus on combat leaves them with limited options for dealing with complex strategies other factions may bring to the table.

Final Thanks

Every single one of us at Lightmare Studios is ultra thankful for your time, pledges and sharing of this Indie GoGo. We look forward to delivering an incredible product along with your incredible rewards.

Hardcore Strategy - Most digital trading card games have oversimplified and gone all mainstream with their game mechanics. We've done the opposite and increased strategic depth by including positioning, yet allowing unlimited cards on field.

Weekly New Releases - New quests are created constantly providing new levels and brand new cards to unlock each and every week.

Comprehensive Ever Changing Single Player Campaign - We have an in depth Single Player Campaign, that will have side quests added to it each week. All cards unlockable without ever needing to play a human.

3D Transformable Battlefield - The default 3D Battlefield can be changed by playing Location cards which transform the field of play.
 
Stretch Goals
Together, we can obliterate the initial merged campaign goal and get every "Count" and "Prince" more rewards. 
For every goal we pass:
Each "Count" (and "Duke") will get one of EVERY stretch goal prize unlocked by the end of the campaign.
Each "Prince" (and higher) will get 4 of EVERY stretch goal prize unlocked by the end of the campaign.
Note this is limited to one set of prizes for each backer, so ordering 2x "Counts" will NOT give you two of every card.
Here's the Prizes already unlocked thanks to our other crowdfunding campaign. Anyone funding here on Indie GoGo at the relevant level instantly gets ALL these cards as a bonus:
 

650 backers

40k achieved 

 
 33k prize unlocked.

 
27k prize achieved

 
22k prize achieved, Hellmouth Location Card.

17k Prize Achieved

13k Prize Achieved (2 for "Counts" and "Dukes", 8 for "Princes" and above).

330 Backers Prize Achieved.

5k Prize Achieved.

120 Backers Prize Achieved.

7k Prize Achieved.

220 Backers Prize Achieved.

9.5k Prize Achieved.
And here's a snapshot of the achieved and announced goals:

Indie GoGo Rewards

 

What We've Done So Far
Gameplay Prototype Screenshot
Prototype Deck Editor

3 More Example Animated Cards



Currently we're midway through our Alpha stage, with most cards created and our standard multiplayer game mode fully working. We'll be heading into Closed Alpha on December 7th, so you won't have to wait long to start experiencing and influencing how the game will play when it goes public. Closed Beta will be around January.
Rest assured there's no chance the game won't make it to release as we have more than enough private funds to cover basic production; your pledges will allow us to bring extra features and get the game launched in as many countries as possible.
Why We Want To Do This
We’ve been waiting and waiting for a “proper” Digital Trading Card game to be made for a couple of years now; and whilst there are Digital Trading Card games out there, rarely are they truly strategic and deep, and we’ve found none have hit on all levels and made full use of this wonderful digital technology most of us have in our pockets. It felt like being hit in the face with a Kobold club when we realized the world was ready for one, and we are the guys to do it. 
We’re an independently owned and funded studio, with talented artists and genius coders, who are in love with both video games and card games. Your pledges allow us to create an even better game than we would without it, and we get to thank you for causing that with exclusive rewards.
The First Five Factions
 
The Sleepers of Avarrach

Lore – On the world of Avarrach, cybernetic modifications were the norm, its citizens enhancing their bodies with nano technology. However, sleeping within their nanobot technology was a dangerous flaw: a backdoor which could rewrite any any nearby nanobot into a copy of itself. One day, centuries ago, a nanobot virus was unleashed upon the world: one that would take over the host’s body, killing it, then aggressively spread to each nearby nanobot. The world of Avarrach turned into a nightmare. Within three days, 90% of the world turned into unthinking husks, the human host dead, but animated by the nanobot technologies embedded in their body. The survivors, those without augmentations, fought as best they could, but soon were overwhelmed. The nanobots took over their bodies and they too joined the undead horde.
The virus animated each body to seek out and feed on any living thing, and for years, the zombies went on a rampage, devouring all living things they could find, until eventually the planet was completely devoid of life. With nothing left to feed on, the undead stopped moving, sleeping, the virus waiting for new living to devour. There they laid for hundreds of years, unmoving. When the rifts opened to the Old World, the Sleepers of Ararrach slowly woke from their deep sleep, smelling new life to feed on.
As only the Sleepers closest to the rifts have awoken, few understand the true danger. However, in time the whole planet will awaken, and every world will face an incredible threat.
Mechanics - The Sleepers of Avarrach are relentless, and ultimately unstoppable. While a single zombie is of little threat, over time more and more zombies arrive, overwhelming the enemy. Killing a Sleeper of Avarrach is often only a temporary respite, as they are the best faction at using their graveyard, bringing many cards back from the dead, over and over until the enemy is overwhelmed. Furthermore, many of the Sleepers are infectious: when they kill an enemy character, that character gets turned into an undead, and the Sleepers gain control of it. To defeat the Sleepers, enemy players must manage keeping the undead under check, while simultaneously advancing their own plan swiftly enough to win before they are overwhelmed.
The Cult of Verore

Lore - The Cult of Verore delves deep into black magic, constantly perfecting their spells of death. It was they who opened the Hellmouth, unleashing the demons into Reish and covering their world in darkness. A corrupted Aleta, the leader of the Verore, cares little. 
Mechanics - The Cult focuses on character removal abilities, they are the masters of making things die. Sitting from the support zone, their unlimited character - the Verore Death Watchers - become stronger with each enemy that goes to the grave, until they are able to destroy the opposing player from the power they fed off. However, if their kill spells are successfully dodged by being moved into the support zone by a skilled player, the Verore can find themselves overwhelmed by their enemies. 
Genesis Industries 

Lore - Genesis Industries seeks to remodel the world with their highly advanced, hyper efficient technologies. Everything and anything can be improved to be bigger, faster, stronger. Orion, the leader of Genesis Industries, is a visionary who is on a mission to ensure the world is able to keep up with the accelerating demands of civilization, a mission in which nature’s time has past, and anybody who stands in the way must be destroyed. 
 Mechanics - Genesis Industries cards are the masters of building up. With time and an influx of resources, the Industry can build up huge, overpowering characters that dominate the battlefield. Furthermore, they are the masters of reusing their resources, able to recur cards from their graveyard to continue their fighting effort. A Genesis Industries player must be find a fine line between power and greed however, as putting all their eggs in one basket with a single powerful character can be disastrous if they misread their opponent. 
The Flame Dawn 

Lore - The Flame Dawn is an organized, aggressive army. Their leader, Aberion, is said to be invincible in battle, and nobody has been able to prove it wrong. He leads an aggressive campaign to expand the borders of the Flame Dawn, to forge a great empire that will last for ages. When the rifts opened, The Flame Dawn immediately entered and began aggressively claiming territory under their flag. 
 Mechanics - Flame Dawn cards are very aggressive, aiming to win the game quickly with a swarm of characters before other, lumbering strategies can come fully online, or at least deal so much damage in the early turns of the game that the enemy is always on the back foot. The cost for their speed, however, is a lack of staying power, as their removal abilities are all temporary, providing a window for victory that they must quickly seize. 
The Warpath

Lore - The Warpath is not so much a faction as a collective understanding by the beasts of the Old World that they must fight back against the intruders. Named not by themselves, but by the invaders from the other dimensions upon seeing the horror of hundreds of massive beasts bearing down on them with killing intent, “being caught on the warpath” is a horror story passed between all the would-be conquerors of the Old World. 
Mechanics - Like the beasts of The Warpath, the cards of The Warpath are usually simple, but strong. There are no small beasts. Each beast is a large killer, often able to take on many characters from other factions in direct combat before dying. The beasts strengthen each other, and have the ability to breed together, able to create new beasts to destroy the opponent with. However, the Warpath’s greatest strength is also their greatest weakness, as their focus on combat leaves them with limited options for dealing with complex strategies other factions may bring to the table.
Final Thanks
Every single one of us at Lightmare Studios is ultra thankful for your time, pledges and sharing of this Indie GoGo. We look forward to delivering an incredible product along with your incredible rewards.

story:
Minecraft Meets Skyrim is the main goal and vision for intense wizardry, with stylized voxel graphics to make Intense Wizardry Immersive and fun to all audiences!

What We Need

  • Funding is needed to hire extra staff and to pay for technology licensing, that stuff is expensive!

 What Do I get from this?

  • With funding sucessful we will be able to give a free copy to every backer and our own special gratitude,
  • every backers name will be put into the credits

Why do I Want This To Happen

I've always wanted to be a game programmer and i've spend the last 5 years of my life working and studying to make it happen, the only problem is cash cows like EA take away the spotlight from interesting and cool indie projects, to make gamers focus on the same game with a different name which is released annually (you know which game im talking about

Other Ways You Can Help

spread the word!, heres the greenlight link if you want to read up about our game

http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=148520570&searchtext=

 

What happens after successful funding?

An epic release of Intense Wizardry plus we will have bought the tools needed to deliver more awesome games, hopefully most free to play, but i do need to eat like once in a while so some form of funding will come to other games

story:
Arenum is a free fantasy gladiator team management game. What this basically means is that you control a team of gladiators, or as they are called in-game, Combatants. You hire randomly generated gladiators from 30 different races with their own unique abilities and traits and build your dream team. When the team is set, you'll face other teams and fight against them in tactical turn-based combat.

Here's a full list of features.

  • Seven different tournaments (Slaves' League, Warriors' League, Heroes' League, Supreme League, Legendary League, The Continental Cup, The Grand Skirmish)
  • Randomly created gladiators; more than a hundred million possibilities!
  • Customize your gladiators by buying them equipment, leveling them up, enchanting their items, changing their wages, training them by hiring masters and in many other ways!
  • Gladiators will also earn experience in different combat abilities such as crossbows, light armor, swords and clubs.
  • The presence of magic is strong! Learn magic with your gladiator and choose from fourteen different spells.
  • Fight against fifty teams controlled by AI. They'll also striving to win their way to the top of Legendary League!
  • Tactical turn-based combat with thousands of different possible tactics!
  • A nice retro feeling in the game; pixelated graphics, 8-bit sound effects and music!
  • A multiplayer mode! Take up your team against randomly chosen teams of your level across the world and try to reach the top of the online team rankings!
  • The Grand Skirmish tournament will pit you against foreign teams of the fantasy world every four in-game years. You'll see them using different technology and items. There might be even foreign races that you are not used to!
  • A versatile, interesting gameplay that will last for at least fifty hours!
  • Many events, for example, wars and slave rebellions! Events will have impact on the arena and your gladiators.
  • You can research new technology! There's 25 items you can discover when researching.
  • Much, much more!

More features will be included in the game depending on how much we'll manage to raise.

 

Download Arenum Demo!

You can download the Arenum demo version and see if the game is worth donating to. Remember: this demo is a very early alpha version of the game. Most of the features are not in the game and the features implemented are not finished. There might be bugs and errors as well.

 

 

 

 

Check out the following screenshots of the game:

Throwing a rock at an enemy

Checking out some statistics

Report screen

Bloody battle

Checking out a gladiator

Battle placing phase

Shopping slaves

Global game chat

 

Also check out these posters:

Poster 1

Poster 2

Poster 3

Poster 4

 

 

If we can reach certain goals, the following features will be added into the game.

$100: Ten more traits!

$250: We will hire a professional to make our website instead of writing it on our own.

$400: We will port the game to Android.

$500: Five mythology-based races!

$1000: Gladiator-specific religions with distinct advantages and disadvantages!

$2000: Five more races, twenty more traits, more sprites for every race making your gladiators more unique, more events!

$5000: Something very cool.

 

 

Here's a couple of good reasons:

  • We need to pay for the game server.
  • We need some devices to study other platforms and to make porting the game to iOS, Android and Mac OS X a possibility.
  • We'd like to pay for my musician and other co-workers.
  • We are mostly students, so providing us money would make this project progress much faster.

 

 

If you can't afford to donate to this project, you can always:

  • Spread the word among your friends, in Facebook, Twitter etc.
  • Write a comment! We respect and read all the comments and try to make the game as good as possible!
  • Subscibe to our YouTube channel.

We thank you. Kiitos.

story:
The Idea

A zombie survival game where you are the zombie and are trying to turn as much of the people in the area into zombies


The Impact

I am a ten year old and it is my dream to become successful in the gaming business also as this is going to be on the mac app store it should make me the worlds youngest mac developer. (The current is 12). I am experienced in coding so there is no need to worry there


What I Need & What You Get

I need a mac mini(600 euros), mac development kit (80 euros) and iOs development kit (80 euros) the perks to start are the game on your choice of platform ($1), the game, the first piece of dlc and a personal thank you on my blog ($10) and all the above, my next game, a digital artbook and a special character($20)


Other Ways You Can Help

You can help by following @ExploGames on twitter as well as using the hashtag #InfectionGame or click the share buttons below

story:
If you want to have more details about what Galactic Wars really is :

http://www.faforever.com/forums/viewforum.php?f=50

 

Short Summary

Galactic War can be described as a MMO-Risk game where you play FA games instead of throwing dices.

Forged Alliance Forever development came to an end.

It was planned, and it reach almost all his goals. Almost ...

Due to my lack of free time, Galactic War was never released. But free time can be bought, and that's why I'm starting this campaign !


The project will be founded no matter the final amount is. The amount of features will depend of the final goal.

If it doesn't reach the goal, I will still work on some improvements for FAF (basically all the stuff that you've asked and that I've answered by "here is the lobby code").

If the goal is reach, Galactic War will happen.

The complexity of the features will depend of the final amount, so I don't want to say things I won't be able to do. But it will as good as it can.

If you wonder why we are using indiegogo instead of kickstarter : You need to be a US/british citizen to use kickstarter. Also, indiegogo allow a project to be funded even it doesn't reach the goal, ensuring that something will happen no matter what !

Thanks you for your support and your trust. Let's write Forever in shiny letters !

Now, make some noise about it !

 

What We Need & What You Get

The goal I've set should be enough to get a nice boost for GW developpement.
Some code is already written, but it need all the backend to be completed.

I can't give an ETA on any of the features, but here is what is planned, as soon as possible, in order :

- Better avatar system.
- Mixed Featured Mods, and better support for mod developpers.
- A working replay vault.
- A Galactic War system equivalent to zero-K.

Every supporter will get an "alpha" access to the GW part of the lobby as soon as it's ready.

If we go past the fixed goal, I'm thinking of hiring a freelancer to help me with the code, and add tons of cool features to it.

What is Galactic War ?

Galactic War will be a meta-game where you battle for a single faction, for the control of the galaxy.

You will have to protect planet in 1v1, 2v2, 3v3, add shields/defense weapons to them, and finally win the Infinite War.

A battle for a planet can be anything FAF can do :

- A simple 1v1 or team game.
- A survival against AI or a human controlling the streams.
- A king of the hill or civilian defense game.
- A game with funny rules.

Each game you play will be a different experience. You will have to win several battles type to win a planet !

Here is an exemple of a similar meta-game : http://zero-k.info/Planetwars

More infos will come during the campaign.

The Result

We can possibly bring more players to FAF, and fix the thing that are not quite good enough.

That can also be a platform for our own Planet Annihilation Galactic War if uber lobby is not good enough. Or why not a cross-over ?

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't contribute but have some coding skills, feel free to contact me !

story:
Don't forget to click above ^ Share, Link, Like, Tweet, Spread the word

Further development can be found at the TIGsource DevLog
Follow development @ www.facebook.com/WalledGarden

The artwork in the videos are not final draft, the game is in the middle of getting a face-lift.

What is The Walled Garden?

The Walled Garden is an action/platformer PC game set in an surrealistic Garden of Eden. I am developing the game for the PC (with a little support from some friends) with hopes to bring it to more platforms such as PSP and Mac if it's successful.

The intent of this game is to create a hectic platform shooter;
Where destroying terrain was both a strategy, defense, and general way of getting around the world.
The whole game aims to be a Random juxtaposition.
  • Surrealist take on The Garden of Eden and the Fall of Man.
  • Outsmart predator enemies, as you attempt to find Eva and hunt down the deity "El".
  • Explore a strange new world; where Destruction leads to Creation.
  • Destroy nearly everything in your path.
  • Collect items, summon creatures, and kill a diety.
  • Discover the secrets that lie in the story of Eden...

The Walled Garden is a 2D side-scrolling shooter which focuses on the events of an ever changing environment, utilize your maneuverability to find Eva and try to leave the Garden forever.

When can I try the game?

Right now!
Although this is more a tech demo and not representitive of the game it's self.
It allows you to tinker and play with the tech demo and see just what my game has to offer.
>>>>>>>>>>>>Download Link <<<<<<<<<<<

 

Who are You?

My name is Derek Boe I am an independent artist and game developer. Who is very much the epitome of a starving artist, since art college has kicked me out for being too poor.
You can view my portfolio website here to see my work.

I started making this game back in 2008
Since then I have been doing all of the artwork/animation, programming and sound effects, as well as developing the plot.

What is the Plot?

By now you all know the story of Temptation.

 

El created Atom from the dust of the ground and in his sleep, split Atom to create Eva.
Atom knew that to eat from the Tree of Knowledge was forbidden.
Tempted by the serpent, Eva offered Atom the fruit...
Atom knowingly chose to sin
"Cursed is the ground because of you; until you return to the ground, for out of it you were taken. You are dust,and to dust you shall return."
Eva was ripped out of existence from this world and forever remains, drifting through dimensional planes...
Expelled from the garden and now alone Atom became increasingly rebellious. Using his new obtained knowledge Atom created a weapon and busted back into Eden...


What still needs to be done?

  • Finish working with composers
  • Begin designing art for the levels such as backgrounds and tile art.
  • Work on the levels and making the level design fun, and interesting
  • Work on finishing all the boss fights
  • Fix up any small bugs with some of the enemy A.I.
  • Get some testers to play my game before release

What do you need money for?

Here is a breakdown of what donations will go towards:

  • $800-$900 to rent a table at Comic Expo 2013
  • $99 for GameMaker: Studio
    So I can release the game on both Windows and Mac OS
  • $1800 to help with living expenses while I work on the game


Any extra funding will help pay for music and advertising.
Even if I don't achieve my funding goal, the game will still be made; Though chances are, if they goal is not met I not be going to school next semester.

What do I get if I donate?

    • Donating $5 or more gets you same-day access to regular 'work-in-progress' versions of the game
    • Instant early access to the full version
    • Access to pitch ideas and critique the games condition
    • Your name in the credits as a special thanks
    • There are bigger rewards for donating more

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can’t contribute, that doesn’t mean you can’t help:

  • Get the word out, share this page, tweet, and help promote the game
  • Dont forget to use the tools above to share!

Who are You?

Don't forget to click above ^ Share, Link, Like, Tweet, Spread the word
Further development can be found at the TIGsource DevLogFollow development @ www.facebook.com/WalledGarden
The artwork in the videos are not final draft, the game is in the middle of getting a face-lift.

What is The Walled Garden?
The Walled Garden is an action/platformer PC game set in an surrealistic Garden of Eden. I am developing the game for the PC (with a little support from some friends) with hopes to bring it to more platforms such as PSP and Mac if it's successful.
The intent of this game is to create a hectic platform shooter;Where destroying terrain was both a strategy, defense, and general way of getting around the world.The whole game aims to be a Random juxtaposition.

Surrealist take on The Garden of Eden and the Fall of Man.
Outsmart predator enemies, as you attempt to find Eva and hunt down the deity "El".
Explore a strange new world; where Destruction leads to Creation.
Destroy nearly everything in your path.
Collect items, summon creatures, and kill a diety.
Discover the secrets that lie in the story of Eden...
The Walled Garden is a 2D side-scrolling shooter which focuses on the events of an ever changing environment, utilize your maneuverability to find Eva and try to leave the Garden forever.
When can I try the game?
Right now!Although this is more a tech demo and not representitive of the game it's self.It allows you to tinker and play with the tech demo and see just what my game has to offer.>>>>>>>>>>>>Download Link <<<<<<<<<<<

 
Who are You?
My name is Derek Boe I am an independent artist and game developer. Who is very much the epitome of a starving artist, since art college has kicked me out for being too poor.You can view my portfolio website here to see my work.I started making this game back in 2008Since then I have been doing all of the artwork/animation, programming and sound effects, as well as developing the plot.
What is the Plot?
By now you all know the story of Temptation.
 
El created Atom from the dust of the ground and in his sleep, split Atom to create Eva. Atom knew that to eat from the Tree of Knowledge was forbidden. Tempted by the serpent, Eva offered Atom the fruit... Atom knowingly chose to sin"Cursed is the ground because of you; until you return to the ground, for out of it you were taken. You are dust,and to dust you shall return." Eva was ripped out of existence from this world and forever remains, drifting through dimensional planes... Expelled from the garden and now alone Atom became increasingly rebellious. Using his new obtained knowledge Atom created a weapon and busted back into Eden...


What still needs to be done?

Finish working with composers
Begin designing art for the levels such as backgrounds and tile art.
Work on the levels and making the level design fun, and interesting
Work on finishing all the boss fights
Fix up any small bugs with some of the enemy A.I.
Get some testers to play my game before release


What do you need money for?
Here is a breakdown of what donations will go towards:

$800-$900 to rent a table at Comic Expo 2013
$99 for GameMaker: StudioSo I can release the game on both Windows and Mac OS
$1800 to help with living expenses while I work on the game
 Any extra funding will help pay for music and advertising.Even if I don't achieve my funding goal, the game will still be made; Though chances are, if they goal is not met I not be going to school next semester.
What do I get if I donate?



Donating $5 or more gets you same-day access to regular 'work-in-progress' versions of the game
Instant early access to the full version
Access to pitch ideas and critique the games condition
Your name in the credits as a special thanks
There are bigger rewards for donating more



Other Ways You Can Help
If you can’t contribute, that doesn’t mean you can’t help:

Get the word out, share this page, tweet, and help promote the game
Dont forget to use the tools above to share!


Who are You?

story:
Short Summary

Thanks for taking the time to learn more about promoting accessible play for blind and visuall impaired children! I'm the mother of a sweet little girl who just happened to be born blind. My name is Hillary Welch Kleck and in the video is my daughter, Madilyn. Madilyn was diagnosed with bilateral anophthalmia in 2005. Since then, I've continuously struggled to find toys and games that she can play with independently. It didn't take me long to figure out that not all toys are created equal! 

Many toys rely on the user to get instructions from visual aspects of the toy like a screen or lights. These toys don't relay the information verbally or tactually for effective use by a blind child. Few toys incorporate Braille, but many can still be adapted at home or school. However, some toys have designs that are accessible with little or no adaptations needed. These are toys that families like mine search for far and wide, but aren't always easy to find. It's hard to tell whether a toy is accessible based on how it looks in a box or even its description online.

So this year, I've taken the time to search and review tons of toys and games that many visually impaired children would enjoy opening on Christmas morning, or anytime of the year! I'm putting together a publication both in print and online called ALL PLAY Accessible Toy Guide for Children with Visual Impairments. The guide will be comprised of lists, details and pictures of all the best accessible toys for families to easily search out the ones best to fit their kid's wish lists, providing for a less-stress holiday! By promoting accessible toys we are one step closer to a more accessible world for children of all sight levels. So consider giving today!

What We Need & What You Get

The funds raised with this campaign will go to the design and publishing, printing and distribution of the 2012 ALL PLAY Accessible Toy Guide for Children with Visual Impairments. Costs include graphic design, printing services, and packaging and postage. 

To thank you for your contribution, we've put together some fun accessible items from being listed in the Toy Guide, to your own Braille thank you card and wristband, or give big by doubling your impact to help us give an accessible toy to a child in need. Braille is cool and we've found that the Braille wristbands make a great conversation piece!

The Impact

Whatever amount you choose, you'll take pride in knowing that you're promoting equal socialization, education, and a fun childhood for visually impaired children. The more we raise, the more families we reach with the guide through their schools, communitites and organizations. 

Like we said, not all toys are created equal. By insisting on accessibility at an early age through learning and play, visually impaired children have the opportunity to share in the community and at school by feeling included instead of left out because they aren't able to participate. Trust me, this is not a good feeling for the child or the parent. We all just want our kids to be happy, and by promoting accessible toys we are one step closer to a more accessible world for children of all sight levels. So consider giving today!

Other Ways You Can Help

"Alone we can do so little. Together we can do so much." - Helen Keller

If you can't make a donation, how about taking a minute to share our campaign with your friends? Lots of people find it rewarding to help someone in need, especially a child with sensory impairments, so please share our campaign with your friends, family, church groups and community organizations. Or, how about making your contribution a gift for a loved one? They'll be inspired that you took the time to give such a meaningful gift. You can share the campaign easily with the Indiegogo sharing tools near our video at the top of the page. 

Thanks for caring!

story:
"Phrazzle Me!" is a game which resembles Scrabble. It plays out in the form of a puzzle and points are awarded for creating correct questions or sentences, not words like in Scrabble. This has been called the evolution of Scrabble. It is totally fun and educational. The idea of color-coding the words in order to learn the rules of the English language a great new concept!

Marcelo Montecinos was born in Santiago, Chile and moved to Toronto, Canada at the age of 9. He didn't know a word of English and was bullied and tormented until he learned the English language. His teacher introduced the new immigrants to Scrabble. He used to take the dictionary home with him in order to learn new words so that he could win at playing the game. Fast forward 30 years and he became a teacher of English as a second language. Since the English language only has 4 or 5 options to the verb (not like French or Spanish which have 18), he realized that he could put these options on a rectangular, wooden stick. He did, and the original Phrazzle Me was born. He got it protected and began selling it worldwide via www.phrazzleme.com.

The idea of color-coding the words came to him in a dream at about three o'clock in the morning. He was flabbergasted! The game now sells in 38 countries and has been featured in newspapers and TV, as well as winning two innovation awards. The idea of being able to help teachers teach the language in a fun, competitive manner is very exciting. Helping students learn the language while enjoying themselves is also fantastic.

Phrazzle Me has received two awards but has never gotten any financial help from any Government or individuals. This has limited its growth. It has had to have controlled growth in order to finance the games and cannot  sell at retail stores yet due to lack of funds.

It's inventor is looking to raise $10,000-100,000 in order to go to China and take control of the production of the games. He plans on using the funds to make an infomercial there. He is sure he can sell 1,000,000 games within a year. Since the games are made there, they can be sold for very cheap and thereby, make it a more-reachable product for the world. At that point, It could also begin selling them via retailers and be marketed as a new board game for all...not just as an English-learning tool/game. Phrazzle Me has the potential to outsell Srabble, within a few years. The funds will also be used for making it an App and on playing the game live online. 20% of all sales will go towards donating games to poor schools worldwide (games have already been donated in Chile, China and El Salvador).

Please help by donating and by spreading the word about this incredible game. Let's combine education with gaming and teach English to the world.

Even animals learn by playing. Why shouldn't we?

Be a part of something BIG!

p.s. All supporters will be given first dibs on future seed financing when the company goes public.

story:
Linux version only if campaign succeeds

Isbarah is a hardcore game mixed between platformer and shoot them up. You will fight against huge and powerful boss and only against them: each combat is a duel. You will have to keep your head and think really fast to stay alive and victorious.

The game takes place in a mysterious world where human imagination lives. You will deal with human-imagined creatures but also against non-imagined creatures called Designless.

                  

Abadon: designed creature

Your father is the god of this world, but this world keeps expanding and he needs you to maintain his supremacy.

But any totalitarian regime, by human or god, is not only white and black...


Challenging Gameplay

You are alone against powerful entities. No one to help you, and you need to think fast, use your power wisely and be cool. Survival is hard, but with big score comes great rewards.

Platformer Vs Shoot them up

You're moving like in a platformer. Your enemies move freely like in a shoot them up. They create rains of bullets to kill you. With your physical abilities and movement capacities it's gonna be hell to survive. But you have your powers...

3 powers :

  • Control time : You can use slow motion to be more accurate and look around.

  • Control speed : You can dash to extract yourself from delicate positions.

  • Control the environment : You can create platforms to use it or make a shield.

Duels

Every combat is intense. No small fries, only duel against powerful and merciless boss.

2D Painting

Yeah, we love beautiful 2D painting. So we put that in the game !


Gameplay Diary

abilities : 



Do you like Touhou Project ? Super Meat Boy ? Shadows of Colossus ?

We do.

That's why we wanted to create a game with an original, yet simple, gameplay.

The result is a game in which every player can grow his own way of moving and surpass himself over and over again. We like creating situations that appear unsolvable at first but that can be achieved with training and skills.

We are fond of 2D painting, and we wanted to bring the player a piece of this art. This goes beyond the visual aspects of the game, as all the gameplay is also impacted.

We now have all the elements we need to bring you guys a fun and challenging game, with beautiful 2D graphics, we just need your help to increase the scope of the game and polish it.




We are currently in development. We have enough money to do the rough version of 5 chapters of Isbarah. This graph will show our progress: 

Luc is working on the design of chapter 5 boss.

Lorène is working on chapter 5 boss and chapter 3 levels

Manouk is making a first set of animations for Chapter 5 boss.

Aurélien is integrating Chapter 2.


Right now, we don't have enough resources to polish and extend the game we already have.

For instance, the editor is a very important functionality for us but it's a complex task and we need time to do it.

So far, we funded everything by ourselves but we need you to make the game greater (for the greater good).

We have three needs :

  • Finish and polish the game : QA, animated scenes, improve animations and other FX.

  • Sound design : we need to outsource this part because we can't do good stuff by ourselves.


Lorène : 2D graphics

Gael : Programming

Manouk : Animation

Luc : Game Design and Level Design

Laurent : Music

Aurélien : Integration and Lead


              

        

        

       

       

          

        

              

       

       

       

        



With 5 chapters we don't have time to show each cool stuff and battle we can make. With time we become more skilled and we would love to add two more chapters with GIANT HUGE BADASS BOSS.


Lv 1 : 44.000 euros 

If we manage to rise 44.000 € we make chapter 6.
Chapters are composed of 3 epic battles with their own unique level. Chap 6 would contain mythological beasts. 

            
Lv 2 : 56.000 euros

If we manage to rise 56.000 € we make chapter 7.
Chapters are composed of 3 epic battles with their own unique level. Chap 7 would contain very specific platformer mechanics, together with the most powerful boss. Must be insane to fight against them.


Lv 3 : 102.000 euros

If we manage to raise 102.000 € we will make three more chapters. Not with the most powerful boss (see above), but with a lot of secrets about the universe of Isbarah.
            

Lv 4 : Locked  

                                                 


Lv 5 : Locked
