story:
What is SweetWhale?

The name SweetWhale is a play on words for the Korean term for loyal or frequent customer, ë‹¨ê³¨ (dahn-gol), which sounds pretty similar to ë‹¨ê³ ëž˜ (dahn-gorae),  which literally means 'sweet whale'. Trust us, in Korean it makes a lot more sense!

SweetWhale or ë‹¨ê³ ëž˜, is a free loyalty stamp card app for iOS and Android devices. It allows customers to conveniently collect rewards stamps on their smartphones, eliminating the need to manage those pesky paper cards. But SweetWhale isn't just an app. For our subscribing merchants we're able to provide an unique marketing service to help create more loyal customers who'll return more quickly, more often. With features such as push messaging, vendors can instantly send promotional messages and special offers to their existing customers. SweetWhale users can also easily share their activity on Facebook, Twitter, and Foursquare allowing businesses to be seen by a larger audience of potential customers. And SweetWhale also provide merchants with analytics about who their customers are and their visiting habits. 

How We Started

The seed for SweetWhale was planted years ago when a couple of us visited Seoul and realized how ubiquitous these stamp cards were at all the restaurants and cafes we frequented. We reluctantly collected them, but thought there needed to be a better, more simple solution to this paper model. Fast forward to late 2011 when a group of us decided to do something these old fashion paper cards.

How We're Doing

Fortunately, the ball is already rolling on our project. The app was launched here in Seoul in early March 2012 and is currently available for free on the Apple App Store and Google Play. With hardly any marketing budget in place we've been able to garner over 2000 downloads and secure over 40 participating vendors in just a span of 3 months. We have a terrific network of vendors and users that love our product and we only want to make our app better and continue to expand our reach!

The Polygonik Team

There are 5 founding members -- Bruce Suh, Jason Park, Hank Kang, Paul Yi and DJ Lee. We have a diverse range of experiences and educational backgrounds; some of us have worked in high tech, corporate real estate, and financial services just to name a few. Our company name, Polygonik, which means having many angles, many sides, was chosen to describe our assembled team.

Why in Seoul

Truthfully, we think Seoul is the perfect city for a product such as SweetWhale. If you've ever visited the city you'd be hard-pressed to disagree. With the overwhelming number of cafes, restaurants and shops, the shear population of the city (+24M in the metropolitan area), the number of smartphone users (+26M nationwide), and the tech savviness of its citizens, this city more than any other is ripe for a product and service such as ours.

We Need YOU!

Although we have a romanticized vision of world domination, we are a startup. Until now we have had ZERO investors, ZERO loans, nor have we asked or received any handouts. So far we've been able to survive on our own two feet and bootstrapping this operation on a super lean basis. But the time has come to send out the signal and ask our friends, families, and even strangers for their support.

Financial support from our Indiegogo backers will go directly towards hiring a part-time designer, covering production costs of our marketing materials, renting an office, as well as feeding our interns and weening off our ramen habit.

We think this modest sum will help sustain us in the short-term. We'll be keeping everyone posted and sharing our journey with you guys on Indiegogo and all our social outlets. Every dollar is appreciated and of course the more the better. With your help we will be able to provide an even better product to our users and service to our vendors!

We sincerely thank you all for your generous support!

All the best,

Bruce, DJ, Hank, Jason, Paul

story:
***Disclaimer: This game is not politically correct. Recommended age is 17 and up. At no time do the creators of this game recommend, condone, or encourage doing anything these Bad Bears do. If you are easily offended or highly sensitive, this game is not for you. ***

Bad Bears: How to Build A Killer (TM)

Will you be a blood thirsty killer? Or an innocent victim fighting for survival? Will you be the stalker, or the stalkee? Will you be able to survive the battle of tooth and claw, knife and gun, screwdriver and frying pan? Will the beets be your undoing? Will Monkey ever get his revenge?
Bad Bears: How to Build a Killer(TM)  is a game of danger, cunning, imagination, betrayal, and the evil that lurks in the hearts of m...err, Bears. Are you equal to the challenge? Roll the dice, draw your cards, and find out.

 

The Game

Roll the dice and choose your fate: Killer or Victim.

Killers start out as sweet little cubs...Crazy Cubs that is. Have you ever looked at a child and known something was just a little off about them? That kid you wouldn't trust with a sharp stick, much less a box of matches. That's the crazy inside, just waiting to grow up and cut loose on the world.

As a killer, that is your goal, to grow up, find your triggers, choose your skills, gather your weapons and let the crazy out...just make sure no one else steals your kill.

Victims start out as...well...every day, ordinary bears. There you are, minding your own business, when suddenly you are the target of not just one, but up to four different killers.

Use your skills, wit, and cunning to fend off your enemies and land them in jail...or six feet under.

The goal for the Killers is to be the one to kill the victim, while making sure no one else gets in your way. The goal of the victim is to survive and take out the killers...

Or you can play the Blood Bath option. Killer versus killer, may the Baddest Bear win.

The Dream

We had a dream. That dream was to create a new game, targeted towards adults, young and old, who share our love of gaming and slightly twisted sense of humor. Irreverence, bear on bear violence, and humor are the name of the game (no pun intended, though there are plenty in the game that are). Well actually, the name of the game is Bad Bears, but you get the idea.

In this age of cell phones, email, instant messaging, gaming apps, and other technological communication marvels we are losing touch with each other. How many times have you sat across from friend, family, your significant other and spent half your time (or even more) staring at your phone? What does it take to get people to set those phones aside and engage in a friendly game? Hopefully this. Cut loose, have fun, settle an argument, cause mayhem and bloodshed, all without the pesky cleanup or uncomfortable explanations.

Who are the creators of Bad Bears?

  • My name is Loria Chaddon. Together with my husband, Scott Chaddon, we have created a new player-vs-player card game aimed at other adults who need a little distraction from the stresses of our lives. Our hope is to bring a little much needed fun to the world, while managing to build a business (Wandering Wolf Press, LLC) that we can be proud of.
  • All the photography was done by me. I have been a photographer professionally, and in my free time, for 9 years.
  • All of the non-photographic art was done by Scott. He has been an artist since he could hold a crayon, and earned a Bachelor's in Art at the University of Alaska, Fairbanks.
  • All of the quotes and sayings on the cards were either written by us or, rarely, one of our favorite authors (with all due credit given, of course).

Why are we asking for your help?

  • Lets be honest, we are asking for your help in getting this game produced because, like so many of you, we have worked long and hard and still seem to be struggling to keep our heads above water. We are hoping that our hard work, and your interest in fun, will help us to actually get a little closer to that American Dream we were all told was possible, but so few have reached. 
  • If we can do that, if we can make our business a success, maybe we will be able to pay it forward by helping others get a little closer to their own dreams through our fledgling publishing company, both by helping new authors and writers get their names out there, and actually being able to provide a few jobs.

What We Need & What You Get

  • We are hoping to raise at least $7500. This amount will allow us to print out our first run of cards, produce a little merchandise, buy items we can photograph to add to available cards, and start marketing the game. Creation is almost complete. Development costs have been reasonable, so far, since I am a photographer, he is an artist, and we are both writers. (Granted, we have been working without pay, and that may be against the law. I might have to fine myself. LOL) Unfortunately, mass production is not cheap. That is where you, dear future players, come in.
  • Anything we raise over and above our initial expenses will be used to produce more decks, expand our business, and start the production of our booster and expansion packs. (Yes, those are already in the works as well.)
  • Each of our perk levels are named after a player level in the game, and provide you something for your generosity.
  • If we don't reach our entire goal, we will use the money donated to fulfill our perk obligations, and produce as many decks as possible in order to move forward with our plans. By no means are we willing to give up so easily.

The Impact

Your contribution to this campaign will help us move forward in our plan to produce this somewhat twisted, yet fun, game and bring something different to the world of gaming. Any help you are wiling and able to give is appreciated more than you know. Every dollar raised here will enable us to speed up the production process and get that much closer to our dream coming true.

Other Ways You Can Help

 

If you are intrigued and would like to see this game be produced (even if just to find out how a can of beets can bring a Bad Bear down) but cannot contribute from a monetary standpoint, you can still help us get the word out. Actually, we would love it if you would get the word out either way. Laugh

Here is how you can help spread the word:

  • Tell your friends, tell your family, tell your enemies, (you know beating them to a bloody pulp in a game would bring some serious satisfaction) tell random strangers. Everyone you tell is another person who might find a new appreciation for Teddy Bears.
  • Share! Share! Share! The more you use the Indiegogo share tools, the more people who will be intrigued by our game.

Help us go the distance, and have some fun in the process. Thank you in advance.

Our hope is to bring a little much needed fun to the world, while managing to build a business (Wandering Wolf Press, LLC) that we can be proud of.
All the photography was done by me. I have been a photographer professionally, and in my free time, for 9 years.
All of the non-photographic art was done by Scott. He has been an artist since he could hold a crayon, and earned a Bachelor's in Art at the University of Alaska, Fairbanks.
All of the quotes and sayings on the cards were either written by us or, rarely, one of our favorite authors (with all due credit given, of course).

Why are we asking for your help?

Lets be honest, we are asking for your help in getting this game produced because, like so many of you, we have worked long and hard and still seem to be struggling to keep our heads above water. We are hoping that our hard work, and your interest in fun, will help us to actually get a little closer to that American Dream we were all told was possible, but so few have reached. 
If we can do that, if we can make our business a success, maybe we will be able to pay it forward by helping others get a little closer to their own dreams through our fledgling publishing company, both by helping new authors and writers get their names out there, and actually being able to provide a few jobs.

What We Need & What You Get

We are hoping to raise at least $7500. This amount will allow us to print out our first run of cards, produce a little merchandise, buy items we can photograph to add to available cards, and start marketing the game. Creation is almost complete. Development costs have been reasonable, so far, since I am a photographer, he is an artist, and we are both writers. (Granted, we have been working without pay, and that may be against the law. I might have to fine myself. LOL) Unfortunately, mass production is not cheap. That is where you, dear future players, come in.
Anything we raise over and above our initial expenses will be used to produce more decks, expand our business, and start the production of our booster and expansion packs. (Yes, those are already in the works as well.)
Each of our perk levels are named after a player level in the game, and provide you something for your generosity.
If we don't reach our entire goal, we will use the money donated to fulfill our perk obligations, and produce as many decks as possible in order to move forward with our plans. By no means are we willing to give up so easily.

The Impact
Your contribution to this campaign will help us move forward in our plan to produce this somewhat twisted, yet fun, game and bring something different to the world of gaming. Any help you are wiling and able to give is appreciated more than you know. Every dollar raised here will enable us to speed up the production process and get that much closer to our dream coming true.
Other Ways You Can Help
 
If you are intrigued and would like to see this game be produced (even if just to find out how a can of beets can bring a Bad Bear down) but cannot contribute from a monetary standpoint, you can still help us get the word out. Actually, we would love it if you would get the word out either way. Laugh
Here is how you can help spread the word:

Tell your friends, tell your family, tell your enemies, (you know beating them to a bloody pulp in a game would bring some serious satisfaction) tell random strangers. Everyone you tell is another person who might find a new appreciation for Teddy Bears.
Share! Share! Share! The more you use the Indiegogo share tools, the more people who will be intrigued by our game.

Help us go the distance, and have some fun in the process. Thank you in advance.

story:
***UPDATE 09.09*** We decided to adjust our perk system. From now everyone contriibuting 5USD will receive „infinite coins“ code allowing to play for free all subsequent, monetized games to be added to compilation in future updates. For those pledging 25USD we will also gift a code to download our first game „DeadEnd: Cerebral Vortex“ from „Gamersgate“

 

WHAT IS „TOUCHIES“?

„Touchies“ is a compilation of simple smartphone games with a twist. The idea was born, when we developed a mini game „Finger Brawl“ which had a single „multiplayer on the same device“ mode. We were trying to make the game competitive, lively and most importantly - with significant amount of direct confrontation. After play-testing it with our families, friends and just random people we‘ve met on the streets, we learned that our design is truly attractive. Most players enjoyed the game and we observed them laughing, trying out different play styles and tempo to compete or just to have fun together.


That was outstanding, so we showed our game to fellow developers to ask their opinion, and we learned that our game design is faulty. You see, most of our colleagues deemed touching each other during gameplay as a flaw, so they suggested dividing playfield, or finding other mechanics to eliminate direct player contact. That was really strange, since „touching“ a person was our main goal. How come that touching, one of the most important ways of perception and communication, is considered a bug?


We won’t fix it. We decided to do quite the contrary and improve upon our mechanics.


THE HUMAN TOUCH


We’re all gamers and there’s a lot of stuff going on within the industry that we really like. We love mainstream, casual and social games, hell - we even like most of ideas introduced at E3 this year, but… At some point it’s starting to get weird. It’s simply going a bit too far. The idea of complementary screen in single player games, or an option to have a part of your gaming universe in a pocket is really cool. But imagine the party were gamers gather to spend their time together for a small FIFA tournament, but instead of watching each other play or just having some beer, people in the same room get out their phones, start shooting screenshots, tweeting match results and engaging in other social activities with huge amount of internauts, who probably don’t even give a damn about it.


Playing games is natural to us. We do it from our first days on earth. As babies we get to know ourselves and the world by simply playing with stuff and touching it. And it stays this way for the rest of our lives. Inevitably, the most precious and important perception seems to be limited to glass. We look at it and we touch it, relying on sole power of imagination. It starts to look natural and it’s a bit scary.


But don’t get us wrong, we’re not here to change the world, we don’t even believe that single game or application is able to change anything, change must come through a series of small events in many different fields. What we’re hoping to achieve is a simple alternative, and with a bit of luck, we could start people talking about the problems that lead to social alienation.


CURRENT STATE OF A PROJECT


Currently we have 3 working mini games and twice as many prototypes. We switched to a mini game compilation, simply because our original „Finger Brawl“ tends to be competitive, perhaps even a bit aggressive game, so we developed additional games focusing on different gameplay experiences. We will have a „Castle Crush“ game involving some strategic elements and perhaps co-op play. We will have „Boil Me“ — slower cooperative game with a romantic twist. We will have simple games for families, designed in a way where parents get to participate in play and mentor their kids. We will have many more small games focusing on puzzle elements, agility, common knowledge, etc. All our games will be multiplayer on the same device, and designed in a such a way that touching your opponent will be inevitable.
Currently we’re polishing our first three games for launch and we have a plan to add new games on a timely manner.


THE TEAM


We’re Arvydas, Marius and Arthur. Team „Membranos“ was founded a year ago and we self-published our first game „Dead End: Cerebral Vortex“. Arthur joined the team a bit later, when we started our work with „Touchies“. Currently all of us have primary jobs, so „Touchies“ is a sort of a hobby.


WHY DO WE NEED CROWD FUNDING?


Well, there are many reasons, swinging from season change to lack of hardware, so let’s go on step by step:


• Summer is over and we put a huge part of it into this project. We made a couple of games, play-tested them and tried to find the necessary finances. We didn’t secure a sufficient amount, but our vacation’s over and we’re about to get back to our primary responsibilities. So it’s now or never situation for us and „Touchies“ and we would prefer „Now“.


• We’re developing the games on „Unity“ engine, so it can be released on „Android“ and „iOS“ platform. We would like it to happen simultaneously, but we don’t have any hardware to port game for „iOS“. So we basically need a Mac and a couple of iPhone’s for play-testing purposes.


• We would like to support our launch with a website and game dedicated videos. Also we will probably need to hire additional artist to produce more assets for current and upcoming games.


LET’S MAKE THIS HAPPEN!


We’re releasing „Touchies“ as a freemium game at the end of September, that’s bound to happen, since we don’t have a lot of choice. How big and nice the launch will be? Well, it basically depends on you — the crowd. We’re all on the same boat here and if you’re seeing the same problems as we do, please help us spread our words and ideas further. Your support will be used to get the necessary hardware. We will polish and play-test our app, also we will launch a website and a social network page sharing the information about our game and why we believe „touching each other“ is not a bug.

You can support us by donating an amount of your choice and also by simply spreading the word around. We’ll take all we can get!

story:
About me and the project

My name's Joe Incorvaya and I'm a uni student and indie dev living in the south of wales, I've made a couple of games to date, which you can try out at www.inkidia.net, and am currently working on my newest project: Voltorometer 2.
 
Voltorometer 2 is the sequel to a game I made back in june 2006, there was also a remake of the game released in the same year and a flash port of the remake released in 2010.
The game is going to be released on my site as a freeware game, but there'll also be the option to pay a donation for it if you want to support me.
 
 
The game is a challenging platformer set across 8 worlds and based on the concept of running through levels as quickly as possible and whilst taking as little damage as possible to get a higher score. The higher your score, the better your rank at the end of the world, a better rank will unlock extras in the game such as challenge levels, characters and new game modes.
 

Why I'm asking for funding

I'm looking for funding because although I can code and make simple sprites for my games, I can't make music. The funds I raise would be used mainly to pay my composer for the music he makes, but anything over will be used to both commission new tracks to be made and to increase the amount of content in the game in general.

What you get

For the $1 perk I'll send you an email when the game is released as well as a link to download the game.

For the $5 perk you'll get the $1 perk and I'll put your name in the credits at the end of the game.


For the $25 perk you'll get both the $1 and $5 perks and I'll send you some hand drawn concept art of enemies/environments/characters from the game.

For the $50 perk you'll get all the previous perks plus, you'll get the ability to specify a type of level and its name and I'll design it and add it to the game, it will be playable in every copy of the game.
You can be as specific as you want and the theme of the level isn't restricted to any of the types of levels in the game, it can be anything (within reason, it has to be SFW), if you want me to make a level based on cake, then I'll make a level based on cake with it's own unique enemies and other assets, but if you just ask me to make a really hard water level, then that's fine too.
The concept art you receive will also be art of things that I design for your level.

For the $100 perk, you get all the previous perks plus I'll let you design your own unlockable character that will be playable in every copy of the game.
The design follows the same rules as the level in that it can be anything as long as it's within reason, is SFW and doesn't infringe any copyrights.
You can also specify unique abilities for the character and I'll add them in (but I'll be balancing things so that they have weaknesses compared to other characters)

Thanks for any support you can provide!

story:
Contest for all donors

Want to see your very own game idea come to life? Want to earn some money from it? Help us reach our goal onhttp://igg.me/at/wordclash, submit your game idea to contest@jappistudios.com, and your game could come to life free of charge!

Who we are

Jappi Studios is small indie app design company. The dreams of one man, Jared Brandjes, are what fuel Jappi Studios. Big dreams and big ideas is the name of the game and without you, they're not possible.

The Game

Word Clash, the new free multiplayer word puzzle game. Battle your way to the top by smashing your opponents, puzzle after puzzle. Gain rank and unlock power ups to use against your enemy and win! Play against your friends too and make them bow to your power, haha, just kidding, don't do that 0.0.

The game is simple. You are presented with a grid [1] full of letters and some solid blocks. You can touch and drag the letters around. The point of the game is to be the fist person to successfully get all his/her letters into the right spots, making up the words given to you in the word list at the bottom [3]. Some tricks to the game involve using power ups [4] to either disable your opponent (Time Stopper, Sabotage) or to give you an edge (Hint, Points Multiplier). There is also the Enemy View [5] which shows you the opponents completed words. This feature allows you to catch up and keep the battle intensity high. Keeping this in mind allows you to work out a strategy to conquer your enemy! At the end of the game you are presented with your points earnings which are used to increase your rank. As you climb higher on the totem pole, you unlock different power ups and bonuses.

The game will be available on iOS and Android platforms.

What We Need & What You Get

In order to make this game a reality, we need $17 000 which covers the costs of developing the game, designing all the graphics, marketing the game and submitting it to the various mobile stores (App Store, Google Play).

The game is estimated to take about 10-15 weeks to complete.

If the we do not reach our target, don't fret, the game will still be developed as much as possible. We are not some huge company looking for a good pay day. Its just me, an indie app designer/dev with big ideas and big dreams. 

Please help us/me out in this adventure and I promise it will be worth your while!

As a donor, you will have front row seats to the development process. We will keep you in the loop with everything, and if you have an idea or comment, you will be heard.

As a Supporter you will receive the following rewards: Special in-game Profile Badge. Power Up Bonus Pack.

As a Contributor you will receive everything above as well as: Special-Edition Power Up: Earthquake (Shakes up your opponents board destroying some of their words).

As a Donor you will receive everything above as well as: Your chosen username reserved for launch.

As a Sponsor you will receive everything above as well as: Permanent picture on our websites sponsor wall. Limited edition Word Clash/Jappi Studios dog tag. Limited edition Word Clash Key Ring.

As the Awesome person you are, you will receive everything above as well as: Your name in the contributors credits. Free power ups for life. Limited edition Word Clash/Jappi Studios iPhone 4/4s/5 black cover. Direct line to Jappi Studios development team.

Because of those oh-so-sexy pants you're wearing, you are entitled to everything mentioned above plus 5 vouchers for free copies of any Jappi Studios app/game, already existing or future releases. PS there are more planned for this year. Pre-Launch game testing involvement.

Because of those oh-so-super-awesome-sexy pants you're wearing, you are entitled to everything mentioned above except 'Captain Awesome Pants' plus a free copy of EVERY Jappi Studios app/game, already existing or future releases. PS there are more planned for this year. Pre-Launch game testing involvement.


The Impact

This game is being made for you. Our quest is to entertain you and make you happy =)

Other Ways You Can Help

If you cannot contribute at this time please don't be shy to get the word out there and help us out. Without your help, this project is not possible. Use the share tools provided below.


Word Clash by Jared Brandjes is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial-NoDerivs 3.0 Unported License.

story:
Indiegogo I have arrived!..And I'm low on gas.

 

I come to you today in search of your energy, enthusiasm, support, and ofcourse capital. For the past several months I've been developing a game that boldly stands apart from my previous horror-inspired work titled Iron Weasels.

 

The premise of this game is to re-capture the kinetic feel of arcade titles like Joust, Defender, and Sopwith while encapsulating it in a manic cartoonish spy-vs-spy like rivalry set between two wreckless weasel-like pilots with no concern for their own safety.  The playing fields run the gamut of a bright spring day to a city besieged by a gigantic skyscraper-chucking monster.

 

Here's where you come in.

 

In an ideal world I could live forever off fanfare and cheers.  I would also have my own giant skull fortress in the caman islands staffed by hench-women in catsuits with lazer-teeth.  Sadly, this is not the case.  I need your financial support as I continue to wrap this project up, find a sponsor or publisher, and get it into your hands in the best way possible.  Game development has become my dayjob, and there's no salary, health insurance, company car, or skull fortress in this line of work.

 

So in summation, I love this game.  I know you're going to love it too.  I can't wait to get it out there to watch youtubes of you all pwning eachother in the skies, raining bits of firey shrapnel down upon carnival go-ers and children with balloons.  For that to happen, I'm going to need to hear some action from the generous back section.  Don't make me beg, my begging barrel is in the shoppe.

 

Love and all my weasels,

-Amon26

Here's where you come in.
 
In an ideal world I could live forever off fanfare and cheers.  I would also have my own giant skull fortress in the caman islands staffed by hench-women in catsuits with lazer-teeth.  Sadly, this is not the case.  I need your financial support as I continue to wrap this project up, find a sponsor or publisher, and get it into your hands in the best way possible.  Game development has become my dayjob, and there's no salary, health insurance, company car, or skull fortress in this line of work.
 
So in summation, I love this game.  I know you're going to love it too.  I can't wait to get it out there to watch youtubes of you all pwning eachother in the skies, raining bits of firey shrapnel down upon carnival go-ers and children with balloons.  For that to happen, I'm going to need to hear some action from the generous back section.  Don't make me beg, my begging barrel is in the shoppe.
 
Love and all my weasels,
-Amon26

story:
"No Character Without Portrait" Project

Text in Spanish here.

There are countless incredible characters arround the world, for all the roleplaying games we all know and love: D&D, Pathfinder, World of Darkness, StarWars, Call of Cthulhu and many more.

But... only a bunch of them has a proper portrait that reflex his own unique personality with all the fidelity he/she deserves.

I just want to end with this. I have launched this crowfunding project to draw all the characters you want me to draw.

They are your windows to another incredible worlds. This is the least you can do for them.

The rewards

All the help is welcome, but you wont spend any money here without a reward. This is what you will get if you fund this project:

Taster level: At 5$ you will get a taste of my abilities. Maybe someday you will let me draw a portrait your character deserves. This is a compendium of 8 royalty free zombies that you can use as you want in your free or payd projects. This reward is included in all the bigger reward levels. This is the pack:

Inked level: At 20$  you get an inked portrait of your character with no background. You tell me how is your character and I'll draw him/her as he/she deserves. These are some inked samples:

Black & White level: with 30$ you get a really cool draw of your character, with grey scale details, just like the ones you see here:

"I have a name!" level: At 50$ your highly detailed black & white character portrait includes his/her name on it, in a cool way like our beloved Cthulhu shows us in this sample:

The Real Character Black & White level: at 150$ you get the ultimate portrait in black & white. You will be receiving the progress along the way to its creation and will give me instructions about it. This is the higher level of detail a Black & White portrait could have. Only for gamers in love with his/her characters. A sample, the zombie love:

The Real Character In Color level: He has guide you through all your adventures together. You have visited worlds at his/her side. Now, you will thank him/her with this incredible highly detailed portrait in full color! Because he/she deserves! This will be get at 200$, and is the only one that includes background. Some samples published by AdventureAWeek.com:

 

 

The Author

My name is Ramon Lucha. I'm a spanish artist specialiced in fantasy and horror illustration. I have been drawing since I could remember. Now, I have a way to take to this reality the characters from the other worlds.

You can check my portfolio here: http://RamonLucha.com/gallery

For any question you can email me at personal (at symbol) ramonlucha dot com.

Conclusion

Your characters would give their lives for you. Maybe your character has given his/her already. They has been your eyes and your hands in those other increcible worlds. Now, it's time to give them back the portrait they deserve.

Bring you character eternal life with a portrait!

 

 

* Delivery dates depends on the number of pledges.

** I don't draw real people portraits. So, please, don't pledge if you want a "make a fantasy version of myself" type of portrait.

story:
Forests of Eden: An Online Game to Save the Forests

Imagine you could protect the forests of the world with playing an online game! You could enjoy exciting adventures in the virgin forests around the world, and while playing you would help Greenpeace to fight against forest destruction in the real world. Sounds great?

In fact, that's exactly what we're doing at Playotope, an independent game studio based in Berlin. We are a small bunch of nerds with a passion for great games, and we really love and care about nature. That's why we started to develop "Forests of Eden", a new combination of wilderness adventure game and garden simulation.


Forest adventure in "Forests of Eden"

Play and Protect

Forests of Eden is a browser-based online game, meaning that it's playable on any regular PC without a need for installation. As a player, you'll discover secret medical herbs in the forests of the world and grow them in your own virtual garden. You'll come across native forest people and learn about their ancient wisdom of herbal medicine. And you'll meet environmentalists who need your help to protect the endangered forests - inside the game and in the real world.


Support real environmental campaigns inside the game

We are developing "Forests of Eden" in cooperation with the Greenpeace Innovation Lab in Buenos Aires, Argentina. This ensures the highest standard for our ecological messaging, and it will help us to reach countless people around the world.

Help us To Save the Forests!

There are many ways you can support us. Some of the most important are:

  • Like and share the link to this page.
  • Visit and like our Facebook Page
  • Send an email to all your friends and tell them about this project.
  • Write a blog post or news article and link to this page.
  • Contribute any amount and claim one of the great perks we've prepared for you.

Any way you choose will help to make Forests of Eden a great success.

These Rewards Are Waiting for You!

All items are delivered as digital goods in February 2013 unless stated otherwise.

*delivery in January 2013
**free shipping in the EU, or $10 shipping fee
***travel expenses not included

story:
New Fundraiser

Participate in our new fundraiser to help make Foxotic possible! Go to the new campaign by clicking on the link below!

http://foxotic.com/indiegogo

Short Summary

Hi, I'm Ben! I'm the founder of Foxotic, an upcoming virtual world targeted for kids! We plan on developing a virtual world for kids by summer of 2013 that is fun yet educational. All work will be done in Flash and we will be programming our own servers. 

We have servers to maintain, artwork to create, and a lot of ingame and external features to develop. Unfortunately, this project requires a lot of money and time. This is why we are asking you to step in and help make Foxotic possible! :)

What We Need & What You Get

We currently need a good amount of money in order to continue development on Foxotic. All donations will be used to develop and maintain Foxotic. Donors will receive special perks depending on how much you contribute.

The Impact

With over seven years in the virtual world and gaming industry, we know how to create a virtual experience that is fun, unique, educational, and safe for children. By contributing, you are the beginning structure of making Foxotic possible. 

Other Ways You Can Help

Can't contribute? That doesn't mean you can't help:

  • Follow us via Twitter @Foxotic
  • Send us your ideas, fan art, and suggestions! 
  • Spread the word about and help create Foxotic Land! :)

story:
We are Swag House Entertainment

We're an independent music label based out of Gainesville, Fl. Since it's original foundation as a Hip-Hop group in 2009, Swag House Ent. has been producing exciting and innovative music and shows in the Gainesville area. 

We've always strived to make our brand of entertainment interactive, fun, and memorable for all of our fans. 

The personal interaction and bond that is formed between our artists and fans through the music we produce is the cornerstone of the Swag House Entertainment culture. 

We would like to expand and enhance our team culture by launching a game application designed for users of all ages and background but intended to discover and foster the innate musical abilities in each player. 

The purpose of the game is for players to help finish an original Swag House Entertainment song with selected, visually-enhanced, sound banks provided at each level of game play. The game will tie-in with current popular social media sites so each time a player completes a song, a notification will post on the player's linked sm pages. 

The level on intensive interaction between player and song featured in the app is designed to encourage and promote an introduction of the player to music production, theory, and application. Players will be exposed to more and more challenging songs as they advance in the game.

We are planning to launch a fully operational app for both Android and iOS devices. Oddentity Media will be designing the app.  

Together, We Can Make Music

The cost of fully designing and launching the app is $4,500. Being conscientious and understanding of our current economic climate, we'd like to achieve our full launch through various stages of funding. 

We've decided to begin this project by first creating a demo app for iOS devices. The cost for this phase of the project is only $1,500.  We are hoping to reach our goal of $1,700 in order to help cover fees associated with the services provided by IndieGoGo.

All of the generous donors who help us reach our initial goal of $1,700 will have an opportunity to be the first beta testers of our new app! 

The Impact

Music is an art form that bonds us all as human beings. With your help, we can create an app that further strengthens this bond and helps players discover their own hidden talents and abilities.  

Other Ways You Can Help

We appreciate any support that we can get from our devoted fans. Please help us get the word out of this campaign by using the IndieGoGo share tools and passing the word around. Thank you very much!

story:
What's This About?

It's been our goal for a long time to have a 24/7 always up Minecraft server to play with our fans, and now with a little help from you wonderful people we will actually be able to get it up and running.

What Does My Money Buy?

All money raised in this campaign will be put towards paying for the largest possible server for one year, we will purchase the maximum number of slots that the raised money can buy.

What Mods/Mode Will The Server Be?

Currently, the plan is create a simple vanilla survival server with some basic mods in place to make the slightly more complex features possible, such as buyable plots for in game currency and reserved slots for VIP supporters.

story:
Do you like playing online games on your smartphone? The Tapforme founder enjoys it too. That's why one day he asked himself what if many routine aspects of mobile games (that typically take a lot of time) could be automated?

That is a perfect solution for:

  • skipping monotonous actions that usually need your attention but are not that enthralling

  • enjoying best parts of a game and participating only when you want to

  • getting more free time (and time for repose) and constantly increasing your hero's progress.

It took a few months of experimenting, research and tinkering to answer this challenges. To achieve what we have today, it cost about 250 man-hours and around 1,000 lines of actual code. Those are debatable metrics, but it can still give you a grasp of the amount of effort already invested in the prototype, and that's only the beginning.

We introduce you Tapforme – a mobile application that performs routine tasks in online games.

The early proof-of-concept Tapforme version is already impressive. At the moment, our program is able to play Heroes of Dragon Age and Angry Birds automatically.

Right now, while you are browsing the Tapforme campaign page, it collects a few dozen rare creatures in daily PVE events, not to mention gaining experience and gold. During PVP, it also gathers crystals, runes and wisps – essentially anything you would have to do manually. Once the task is completed, it locks the device and goes to sleep until it has fresh stamina and energy again.

Take a look at some Tapforme achievements during one HoDA game session:

You might have missed it but you didn’t! Tapforme does it for you while you are sleeping.

Tapforme is a standalone app that you launch a game from. Every action the app performs is the same as if performed by yourself.  For the game it looks like you are online i.e. the app makes the effect of your presence in the game. The only difference is that a set of routine actions you define in the settings are performed automatically. The game goes on in the real time, but you do not have to touch the screen – Tapforme will do everything for you. It is absolutely safe both for your device and for your game account. As the app performs only allowed actions in the real time, it is neither cheating nor hacking. The app collects no personal information and never asks for your password to game account.

Tapforme is here to make life easier for players and that is why we do not strive to complicate it with additional profiles (at least for now – leave your feedback!) or intricate setting systems. After logging in, you will see a list of supported games and a number of simple settings for each of them. On this page, you can define how long the app should run, how many cycles it has to cover and what actions it may perform.

For example, you can allow the app to participate in PVPs or only in PVEs, it’s up to you! The settings may be changed at any time and the app requires no special attention after that. Now you can launch the game by tapping one button and simply go to bed or listen to a lecture while your smartphone is playing for you.

It’s easy. This is simply technology at your service.

One of the many good things about the Tapforme is that it offers more complete and detailed statistics than the game itself. Tapforme collects various interesting information. You can find out how many hours the app was online per day, week, month or year, compare statistics for different periods (presented by fancy visual graphs) and examine the peak moments of your engagement.

And that is only time-related statistics! Additionally, you will be able to examine:

  • PVP victory ratio

  • how much resources Tapforme has collected for you

  • how the resources were used by the application.

Tapforme will give you no unfair advantages in the game – it is not cheating whatsoever. The only thing you get is your free time and free hands! All the extra things you are going to get with the app you can get by yourself, but at the expense of a night spent playing. With Tapforme, you make bulk actions perform automatically and can free your time for something else. Tell us if we are wrong, but is it not really exciting?

The app is safe for your phone and game account. It plays the game just like you would and in real time. The app imitates the presence of the user. In fact, you stay online, but you do not have to keep touching the screen and checking the process.

The app is not intended to create personal profiles or players’ communities inside the game, but instead, it lets you share your improved, more detailed statistics with other players. Open the statistics screen, save it as an image and post it to your guild’s forum or send it as an email.

Take a look at early-prototype user design:


Totally. Tapforme does not interfere with the game code in any way. The app will never ask you to provide personal information or make any changes in the game account (it has no impact on your account at all). No hacking or cheat codes, but pure automation.

We think of Tapforme as both a social project and a convenient tool for online game players. The app is designed to not only improve the results of a few active players, but also to ensure more fun from playing with less effort.

Tapforme is a must if you:

  • are an active player, maybe even a part of a clan

  • want to get better results by fair means and less effort

  • play from time to time, just for fun

  • want to automate routine actions and get back to play when you are in the mood. Have more fun with your favorite parts of the game and spend less time on monotonous actions, such as farming for resources

  • have to balance between your interest in the game and your real life – school, work, friends and sleep

  • would let the app work while you are away

  • have a relative, friend or kid who likes playing games. Don’t judge, just give the app to this person and help him or her to find a trade-off between the game and social life.

Have you already heard an amazing story about the friendship between a boy and a programmer in our video? This is one of things we are extremely proud of. Tapforme is not only a dedicated tool for active players, but it is also a social instrument. Some people think of playing online mobile games as of a bad thing – parents get angry with their kids, students play truant, people are late to meetings and all of them don’t have enough sleep.

We don’t want to stand in the way of progress. Instead of judgement and criticism, we want to streamline the process and make games more convenient and less time-consuming. Reconciling your interest in the game and your real life is much more efficient than spending hours on resource farming.


One of the most challenging aspects is to develop the Tapforme app for as many device models as possible. Different devices vary in screen size and consequently have different game controls layouts. It takes hours of work to make sure that Tapforme always taps the right spot at the right time and never misses. Also, each device has its own performance issues. Luckily, we are not afraid of hard work and our goal is to make everything work in an efficient manner as soon as possible.

We are at the beginning of a long journey and we want to do everything in the best possible way. For now, we are just a small independent team consisting of the developer and his contributors. We have no external funding, corporate support or insurance. We do it because we have a strong belief in the idea.

With your support, we will be able to make Tapforme real (more real than the working prototype we have already created), release a useful, attractive application and get a good night’s sleep.

The funds we raise will be spent to pay for a coder’s work and the work of those who will help the coder as well as for the app deployment in Google Play and App Store. We have completed the code for Android only and will need some time to optimize it for iOS. This is the minimum we need to release the app for the general public. If we raise more, we will spend the money to make the app even better and in shorter terms – hire another coder, develop more interesting features, adapt the app to fit more devices, and make it work with a larger amount of popular games.

  • Android application

  • iOS application

  • adoptation to various devices

  • gameplay automation

  • user-friendly interface

  • flawless work in HoDA and other games alike

We are a small team working on a great thing and we would be thankful for any support you can offer.

Make sure you've checked out all of Tapforme’s perks listed on the right. Select any of those not only to preorder a subscription with a significant discount, but also to gain unique opportunities and to even get something really personal. All perk benefits stack except Limited Offers.

The list of our offers on the right includes becoming a beta-tester. If you choose to do so, we will send you an invitation as soon as we have the version available for your device.

The more fellow players that know about the Tapforme campaign, the more features will be implemented and the sooner it will be released. So, please spread the word! Share this page on social networks like Facebook, Twitter and HoDA forums or your favorite YouTube channels.

In the meantime, you will help a lot by taking screenshots of different gameplay aspects like dialogs, popup messages etc. that are specific to your device. By doing this, you will save us some effort and allow us to focus on coding rather than collecting raw data.

A significant amount of goals were achieved in the process of development of the original prototype. The core functionality was implemented and successfully tested on real HoDA gameplay. Google Play or App Store release is guaranteed for at least one of the most popular devices, as determined by your votes.

The declared amount of fees is planned such a way to ensure the update and support to app within a year. Also, the project is divided into stages, each cost in the $2,000, which ensures release for aliquot number of devices (the most popular based on the vote of our subscribers).

Speaking of risks, there are still unresolved concerns regarding possible lawsuits on behalf of EA. Technically, we do not break any of their code or gameplay workflow since Tapforme is neither hacking nor cheating software, and it does nothing that normal players wouldn't do by themselves. However, it is always risky to pull on a tiger's tail. In case of any issues, Tapforme support might be suspended until the storm eventually passes by. Please let us know if you have any thoughts or queries regarding this matter.

Our main goal is to make Tapforme an even more convenient and multi-purpose tool for various gadgets and to do so faster, simply because we do not want to make you wait. For this reason, any additional revenue will be spent on making the work faster and more efficient.

And here are some ideas we dream of implementing as soon as the principle functions are finished:

  • advanced consume

  • advanced rune usage

  • smart estimation of opponent's strength in PVP

  • statistics (win %, flag/gem/gold/heroes gathered)

  • user-customizable conditions for PVP AI

  • PVE & PVP events reminder

  • support for less widespread but still popular devices

  • notification upon a certain event (like obtaining a legendary)

  • schedule Tapforme launch (every night for example) since no manual launch = no missed nights of automation

  • pause on incoming calls (or anything disturbing e.g. alarm clock)  and resume afterwards

  • support for other games with similar mechanics.

  • At the moment, our program is applicable to Heroes of Dragon Age and Angry Birds.

    But we don't want to restrict the capabilities of Tapforme. We strongly believe that it will be useful and will facilitate gameplay for fans of other popular games. With your support, it's real. Give us your feedback about the games have routine aspects that could also be automated.

performs is the same as if performed by yourself.  For the game it looks
like you are online i.e. the app makes the effect of your presence in
the game. The only difference is that a set of routine actions you
define in the settings are performed automatically. The game goes on
in the real time, but you do not have to touch the screen – Tapforme will do
everything for you. It is absolutely safe both for your device and
for your game account. As the app performs only allowed actions in
the real time, it is neither cheating nor hacking. The app collects
no personal information and never asks for your password to game
account.Tapforme
is here to make life easier for players and that is why we do not
strive to complicate it with additional profiles (at least for now –
leave your feedback!) or intricate setting systems. After logging in,
you will see a list of supported games and a number of simple
settings for each of them. On this page, you can define how long the
app should run, how many cycles it has to cover and what actions it
may perform.For example, you can allow the app to participate in
PVPs or only in PVEs, it’s up to you! The
settings may be changed at any time and the app requires no special
attention after that. Now
you can launch the game by tapping one button and simply go to bed or
listen to a lecture while your smartphone is playing for you.
It’s
easy. This is simply technology at
your service.One
of the many good things about the Tapforme is
that it offers more complete and detailed statistics than the game itself. Tapforme collects various interesting information. You
can find out how many hours the app was online per day, week, month or year,
compare statistics for different periods (presented by fancy visual
graphs) and examine the peak moments of your engagement.
And that is only time-related
statistics! Additionally,
you will be able to examine:


PVP
	victory ratio


how
	much resources Tapforme has collected for you


how
	the resources were used by the application.


Tapforme will give you no unfair advantages in the game – it is not cheating whatsoever. The only thing
you get is your free time and free hands! All the extra things you
are going to get with the app you can get by yourself, but at the
expense of a night spent playing. With Tapforme, you make bulk
actions perform automatically and can free your time for something
else. Tell us if we are wrong, but is it not really exciting?
The
app is safe for your phone and game account. It plays the game just
like you would and in real time. The
app imitates the presence of the user. In fact, you stay online, but
you do not have to keep touching the screen and checking the process.
The
app is not intended to create personal profiles or players’
communities inside the game, but instead, it lets you share your
improved, more detailed statistics with other players. Open the
statistics screen, save it as an image and post it to your guild’s
forum or send it as an email.Take
a look at early-prototype user design:Totally.
Tapforme
does not interfere with the game code in any way. The app will never
ask you to provide personal information or make any changes in the
game account (it has no impact on your account at all). No hacking or
cheat
codes,
but
pure automation.We
think of Tapforme
as both a social project and a convenient tool for online game
players. The app is designed to not only improve the results of a few
active players, but also to ensure more fun from playing with less
effort.
Tapforme
is a must if you:


are
	an active player, maybe even a part of a clan


want
	to get better results by fair means and less effort


play
	from time to time, just for fun


want
	to automate routine actions and get back to play when you are in the
	mood. Have more fun with your favorite parts of the game and spend
	less time on monotonous actions,
	such as farming for resources


have
	to balance between your interest in the game and your real life –
	school, work, friends and sleep


would let the app work while you are away


have
	a relative, friend or kid who likes playing games. Don’t judge,
	just give the app to this person and help him or her to find a
	trade-off between the game and social life.


Have
you already heard an amazing story about the friendship between a boy
and a programmer in our video? This is one of things we are extremely
proud of. Tapforme is not only a dedicated tool for active players,
but it is also a social instrument. Some
people think of playing online mobile games as of a bad thing
– parents get angry with their kids, students play truant,
people are late to meetings and all of them don’t have enough
sleep.
We
don’t want to stand in the way of progress. Instead of judgement
and criticism,
we want to streamline the process and make games more convenient and
less time-consuming. Reconciling your interest in the game and your
real life is much more efficient than spending hours on resource
farming.One
of the most challenging aspects is to develop the Tapforme app for as
many device models as possible. Different devices vary in screen size
and consequently have different game
controls layouts.
It takes hours of work to make sure that Tapforme always taps the
right spot at the right time and never misses. Also, each device has
its own performance issues. Luckily, we are not afraid of hard work
and our goal
is to make everything work in an efficient manner as soon as
possible.

We
are at the beginning of a long journey
and we want to do everything in the best possible way. For now, we
are just a small independent team consisting of the developer and his
contributors. We have no external
funding,
corporate support or insurance. We do it because we have a strong
belief in the idea.
With your support,
we will be able to make Tapforme real (more real than the working
prototype we have already created), release a useful, attractive
application and get a good night’s sleep.

The funds we raise
will be spent to pay for a coder’s work and the work of those who
will help the coder as well as for the app deployment in Google Play
and App Store. We have completed the code for Android only and will
need some time to optimize it for iOS. This is the
minimum we need to release the app for the general public. If we
raise more, we will spend the money to make the app even better and
in shorter terms – hire another coder, develop more interesting
features, adapt
the app to fit more devices, and make it work with a larger amount of
popular games.

Android
	application


iOS
	application


adoptation
	to various devices


gameplay
	automation


user-friendly
	interface


flawless
	work in HoDA and other games alike

We
are a small team working on a great thing and we would be thankful
for any support you can offer.
Make
sure you've checked out all of Tapforme’s perks listed on the
right. Select any of those not only to preorder a subscription with a
significant discount, but also to gain unique opportunities and to
even get something really personal. All perk benefits stack except
Limited Offers.
The
list of our offers on the right includes becoming a beta-tester. If
you choose to do so, we will send you an invitation as soon as we
have the version available for your device.
The
more fellow players that know about the Tapforme campaign, the more
features will be implemented and the sooner it will be released. So,
please spread the word! Share this page on social networks like
Facebook, Twitter and HoDA forums or your favorite YouTube channels.
In
the meantime, you will help a lot by taking screenshots of different
gameplay aspects like dialogs, popup messages etc. that are specific
to your device. By doing this, you will save us some effort and allow
us to focus on coding rather than collecting raw data.A
significant amount of goals were achieved in the process of
development of the original prototype. The core functionality was
implemented and successfully tested on real HoDA gameplay. Google
Play or App Store release is guaranteed for at least one of the most
popular devices, as determined by your votes.The declared amount of fees is planned such a way to ensure the update and support to app within a year. Also, the project is divided into stages, each cost in the $2,000, which ensures release for aliquot number of devices (the most popular based on the vote of our subscribers).

Speaking
of risks, there are still unresolved concerns regarding possible
lawsuits on behalf of EA. Technically, we do not break any of their
code or gameplay workflow since Tapforme is neither hacking nor
cheating software, and it does nothing that normal players wouldn't
do by themselves. However, it is always risky to pull on a tiger's
tail. In case of any issues, Tapforme support might be suspended
until the storm eventually passes by. Please let us know if you have
any thoughts or queries regarding this matter.Our
main goal is to make Tapforme an even more convenient and
multi-purpose tool for various gadgets and to do so faster, simply
because we do not want to make you wait. For this reason, any
additional revenue will be spent on making the work faster and more
efficient.And
here are some ideas we dream of implementing as soon as the principle
functions are finished:

advanced consume 
	


advanced rune usage 
	


smart estimation of opponent's
	strength in PVP 
	


statistics (win %,
	flag/gem/gold/heroes gathered) 
	


user-customizable conditions for
	PVP AI  
	


PVE & PVP events reminder 
	


support for less widespread but still popular devices 
	


notification upon a certain event
	(like obtaining a legendary) 
	


schedule Tapforme launch (every
	night for example) since no manual launch = no missed nights of automation


pause on incoming calls (or
	anything disturbing e.g. alarm clock)  and resume afterwards


support for other games with
	similar mechanics.



At
	the moment, our program is applicable to Heroes of Dragon Age and
	Angry Birds. 
	
But
	we don't want to restrict the capabilities of Tapforme. We strongly
	believe that it will be useful and will facilitate gameplay for fans
	of other popular games. With your support, it's real. Give us your
	feedback about the games have routine aspects that could also be
	automated.

story:
*Check out the updated prices on our perks!*

40APMStudios is a gaming company based out of Seattle, WA. Our upcoming title is ZNAF (Zombie Neighborhood Attack Friends) http://znafgame.com 

ZNAF is a 4 player co-op game which breaks the cross platform barrier - you can play on any developed game console with a friend on any other console regardless of brand type. Along with PC and MAC, this brings console and PC/MAC players together! We are also releasing for iPhones, Androids, iPads, and Tablets. iPhone and Android players will be able to play together along with iPad and Tablet users.  ZNAF will be localized to the following languages: English, French, German, Italian, Spanish, Portuguese, Brazilian, Japanese,Traditional Chinese, Simplified Chinese, Korean, and open to others.

Pretty revolutionary huh? Our goal at 40APM Studios is to break down gaming console barriers with fun, enjoyable, affordable, games.

ZNAF - Cross Platform Zombie GameZNAF has been in development since 2012, and currently is on hold due to lack of funding. We are very close to having a playable alpha version ready for release within weeks of our Indiegogo campaign.

ZNAF will require six months to finish, for all platforms. Along with development costs are licensing costs, to license with the major consoles (XBox 360, Playstation 3, and Nintendo Wii).

We will be marketing on television, online, and in magazines.

Supporting ZNAF isn't just about helping another game come to life - it's about changing the current standard in the gaming industry. Show game makers around the world we'd like the standard to be cross platform capable games.

Company Overview

Pacific Northwest Video game company, (40APM Studios LLC) seeking funds to resume project nearing completion.  Z.N.A.F. (Zombie Neighborhood Attack Friends) is a casual, adventure, horror, all ages game.

Official Game Page: http://znafgame.com 

Twitter Page: https://twitter.com/ZNAFGame

Facebook Page: https://www.facebook.com/ZNAF40APM

Problem/Opportunity

Game players have been forced to play new titles with friends who own the same system for cooperative online play.

Solution

We want to showcase our new “cross-platform” gaming technology with a widespread release of our upcoming casual, adventurous, all ages, zombie game Z.N.A.F. (Zombie Neighborhood Attack Friends).  Our cross-platform technology allows players to play with each other regardless of brand type of device, limited to PC/Mac/Linux/Xbox/Playstation/Wii and Android/iPhone/Tablet/iPad.

Management Team

Matthew Peterson is the creator of ZNAF (Zombie Neighborhood Attack Friends) Matthew Peterson has been a gaming enthusiast for 28 years purchasing and playing over a thousand different games from early PC, Apple, Atari, Nintendo, Playstation, to more modern systems. He’s been determined to make his passion a career so he started 40APM Studios to prove it.  Matt has years of experience managing automobile and mortgage companies which he applies to running his software company.

Philip Pierce (Developer) http://www.philippiercedeveloper.com/

  • Licensed Nintendo Developer
  • Licensed XBox 360, XBox One Developer
  • Licensed PlayStation 3 (PS3) / PS4 Developer

Software developer with twenty years experience in game development, mobile, web, desktop, server, and database. My extensive background highlights an expertise in rapid application development using the latest Microsoft, Mobile, and Game Development technologies, along with the ability to create AI for games and business software, redesign existing software, develop multi-threaded software, and create client/server applications. 

40APM Studios contracted Philip’s company Merlin AI to develop ZNAF which they’ve been working on since 10/2012

_____________________________________________________

The Z.N.A.F. Story Summary. The beginning Cinematic shows a nefarious character in a trenchcoat and wide brimmed circular hat with glowing red eyes and a tail hanging out and curling up from under the coat enter the “Moz” energy drink facility. This character creeps over to the large mixing VAT and dumps in a glowing green substance from a Vial.

The players (up to 4) in Z.N.A.F. startout having a sleepover party. The father of the players brings home the “New” flavor of Moz energy drink for the players to try out. They continue their party and the next day when the father comes to check on them. They’re not the same, they’ve turned into “Zoms”. The players turn the father into a Zom who then leads them out into the neighborhood to start infecting the world.

Players will have to infect their way through various levels fighting Sub-bosses and bosses meanwhile trying to discover who/what was behind their outbreak. The bosses in Z.N.A.F. are wild and funny, can’t tell you any more without spoilers. Z.N.A.F. is a fun casual Action/Adventure/Horror game with 4 player coop and cross platform capable.

story:
Alpha Version:

http://www.retrosouls.net/files/akalpha.exe

What is AirKnight ?

"Air Knight" is a retro-voxel style shooter where you can destroy everything per voxel.It's developed by "one man team" called RetroSouls.Fell free to support me!

Game uses my own voxel engine called "VoxyEngine".It's written with C# + XNA, so i can easy port it to many pplatforms using MonoGame.

It's currenly in alpha stage.Game will be released at September 2013.

What Is Money For ?

PC Upgrade: my old one is so bad...
iOS,WP8,Android: i need to buy some smartphones and Xamarin licenses.
Mac: i don't have Mac yet, need to buy one
Music: i've need some cute music for the game.

Stretch Goals:

$5000 - Initial Goal (Windows,Linux versions)

$6000 - Android,OUYA Versions

$7000 - Mac version

$8000 - iOS,WP8 versions

$9000 - LevelEditor

$10000 - I've release a VoxyEngine used by AirKnight as Open Source (XNA,MonoGame,C#)

Perks

Alpha version and other bonuses will be sending 11 July 2013.

Risk And Challenges

I've release a game even without fully funded, but only Windows version will be released.

Other Ways You Can Help.

Spread the word about my indiegogo company. Here is a share link: 

http://igg.me/at/airknight/x/3005298

Also feel free to follow me on Twitter or email me direcly submit@retrosouls.net 

F.A.Q.

Q: What platform will this game be available on? 

A: Windows,Linux. Also if i hit goals - Android,OUYA,iOS,Mac,WindowsPhone8.

Q: When will the game be finished by?

A: I'm aiming for a definitive release of September, 2013.

 

Regards,

Denis Grachev

RetroSouls

story:
A Wizard's Wasteland


After humanity has been polluting for decades, the world is in chaos. Where only one wizard can clean up the planet.
On a planet where toxic waste tends to spread. Garbage is granted life and become creatures known as Dumplings. A grumpy old wizard named Tobias resides in isolation, deep in an unknown forest inside of his castle. Until one day unwelcome d Dumplings arrive at his castle. Dragging him into a battle where he is forced to save the planet or suffer from Dumpling invaders. 
  • Grow A Pear is a indie game company that not only wants to make amazing games, that bring people joy, but hopefully make an impact on the planet by adding serious messages.
  • A Wizard's Wasteland is being created so that people find a character that they can relate themselves to. People including myself can be selfish and careless about real issues, until they are personally affected.
  • We hope to deliver a heartfelt message with this game.The planet may not be overrun by garbage monsters, but it is important to maintain and keep our planet clean and safe.
Game Play and Mechanics

Gameplay

Tobias owns a total of 4 staffs. Each staff summons a totem creature, that gives him elemental abilities. Tobias can only carry one staff at a time, making you think more critically throughout your journey. Totem creature types: Phix (fire), BJ (wind/lightning), Drip (water/ice), and Rocken (rock/vines).

  • There will be various puzzles, that must be completed in order to find new areas as well as for progression.
  • World interactions, include destroying enemies or objects for game completion.
  • Game will be played in a unique duel axis platformer.
                             

     objectives 

    • retrieve missing staffs 
    • coin collection (garbage bags) 
    • survive dumpling hordes

              

    How Your Contributions Will Help

         

    • With the funds we receive, we hope to grow as an indie company by becoming more proactive and reaching out to communities 
    • Buy some programs and licenses 
    • Proper Equipment
    • Help spread the word about waste

                                     Platfroms

    A Wizard's Wasteland will be available for Windows and Mac. The full release will be distributed on Steam.

    Why Indiegogo???

    We chose to go to Indiegogo, because we get to keep our freedom and our vision to ourselves. We want to be able to share our vision with our audience which is you guys!

    30k is the minimum

    30k is what we would need on top of what we have already spent with our own contributions. With 30k not only can we complete our game faster, but help us spread a good message to gamers sooner.


    • Every contribution made will help our cause.
    • If for some reason you cannot help, please be kind enough to share our project to others that can.

    Perk Chart


    International Shipping is not Included with most of these Perks please read each one for more details.

    Apprentice

    GET A THANK YOU EMAIL FROM ALL OF US AT GROW A PEAR


    White Mage

    INCLUDES THANK YOU EMAIL, AND A STICKER


    Black Mage

    INCLUDES THANK YOU EMAIL, STICKER, DIGITAL GAME COPY AND CONCEPT ART


    Red Mage

    INCLUDES THANK YOU EMAIL, STICKER,  DIGITAL GAME COPY, CONCEPT ART, SHIRT AND REUSABLE WATER BOTTLE,



    Time Mage

    INCLUDES THANK YOU EMAIL, STICKER, SHIRT, REUSABLE WATER BOTTLE, DIGITAL GAME COPY, CONCEPT ART, GAME CREDIT, CONCEPT ART SINGED BY ALL OF US, AND NAME CREDIT ON OUR WEBSITE

    + 


    Sage

    INCLUDES THANK YOU EMAIL, STICKER, SHIRT, REUSABLE WATER BOTTLE, DIGITAL GAME COPY, CONCEPT ART, AND GET YOUR COMPANY LOGO IN THE GAME

    + 


    Sorcerer

    INCLUDES THANK YOU EMAIL, STICKER, SHIRT, REUSABLE WATER BOTTLE, DIGITAL GAME COPY, CONCEPT ART, GET UNREAL 4 BLUEPRINTS, AND A STATUE CREATED FOR YOU IN GAME


    Arcane

    INCLUDES THANK YOU EMAIL, STICKER, SHIRT, REUSABLE WATER BOTTLE, DIGITAL GAME COPY, CONCEPT ART, AND HELP US COME UP WITH A SECRET STAFF THAT ONLY YOU WILL KNOW ABOUT

      

    +   

    Summoner

    INCLUDES THANK YOU EMAIL, STICKER, SHIRT, REUSABLE WATER BOTTLE, DIGITAL GAME COPY, CONCEPT ART, SKYPE US/MEET US AS YOU HELP US CREATE A NEW DUMPLING


    Elementalist

    INCLUDES THANK YOU EMAIL, STICKER, SHIRT, REUSABLE WATER BOTTLE, DIGITAL GAME COPY, CONCEPT ART, AND GET AN AREA NAMED AFTER YOURSELF.

    +  


    Tobias

    INCLUDES EVERYTHING ABOVE EXCEPT SECRET STAFF


    Short Goal


    $1,000

    Help us reach 1,000 and we will upload a mini demo, so that you can test the game now!

    Stretched Goals


    $30,000 

    Game Completion and uploaded to Steam! 

    $50,000

    Quit our day jobs and speed up the game release to 4 months, as well as showcase our game at the next GDC 2015!

    $70,000

    Release the game onto Playstation 4 and Xbox One!

    $100,000

    Give everyone who donated even a dolla

    r a Plush Doll


    Risks & Challenges

    Game was originally started in UDK, but thanks to Unreal's continuation of making a great engine. We have started over in Unreal 4, the results have been promising thus far. 

    The following is a dubbed and rough cut of the UDK verison we were originally using.


    We have really spent a lot of time and money to be 

    able to make a game that we hope will make an impact. We believe in it and would not be asking for your assistance if we did not.

    This biggest challenge might be having a successful Indiegogo. In reality you have nothing to lose if you enjoy playing games, because this game will be just as fulfilling as any game you have ever played. The only thing you have to lose out on, is an opportunity to be first to get your copy of A Wizard's Wasteland game.

    First time testing out the new Unreal 4

    Exactly one Month later here's what we have added using Unreal 4

    Who are we and what do we do?



    Join our competition!

    Create your very own Dumpling with real garbage! We will vote for the top 3 favorite creations and the winners will have their name in credits plus see their creation modeled and become an enemy in the game!

On a planet where toxic waste tends to spread. Garbage is granted life and become creatures known as Dumplings. A grumpy old wizard named Tobias resides in isolation, deep in an unknown forest inside of his castle. Until one day unwelcome d Dumplings arrive at his castle. Dragging him into a battle where he is forced to save the planet or suffer from Dumpling invaders. 


Grow A Pear is a indie game company that not only wants to make amazing games, that bring people joy, but hopefully make an impact on the planet by adding serious messages. A Wizard's Wasteland is being created so that people find a character that they can relate themselves to. People including myself can be selfish and careless about real issues, until they are personally affected.
We hope to deliver a heartfelt message with this game.The planet may not be overrun by garbage monsters, but it is important to maintain and keep our planet clean and safe.


Game Play and Mechanics

Gameplay
Tobias owns a total of 4 staffs. Each staff summons a totem creature, that gives him elemental abilities. Tobias can only carry one staff at a time, making you think more critically throughout your journey. Totem creature types: Phix (fire), BJ (wind/lightning), Drip (water/ice), and Rocken (rock/vines).

There will be various puzzles, that must be completed in order to find new areas as well as for progression.
World interactions, include destroying enemies or objects for game completion.
Game will be played in a unique duel axis platformer.

                             



 objectives 

retrieve missing staffs 
coin collection (garbage bags) 
survive dumpling hordes

          



How Your Contributions Will Help

     




With the funds we receive, we hope to grow as an indie company by becoming more proactive and reaching out to communities 
Buy some programs and licenses 
Proper Equipment
Help spread the word about waste



  
                                 Platfroms


A Wizard's Wasteland will be available for Windows and Mac. The full release will be distributed on Steam.

Why Indiegogo???
 We chose to go to Indiegogo, because we get to keep our freedom and our vision to ourselves. We want to be able to share our vision with our audience which is you guys!
30k is the minimum
30k is what we would need on top of what we have already spent with our own contributions. With 30k not only can we complete our game faster, but help us spread a good message to gamers sooner.



Every contribution made will help our cause. If for some reason you cannot help, please be kind enough to share our project to others that can. 
 Perk ChartInternational Shipping is not Included with most of these Perks please read each one for more details.Apprentice
